Theory Singleton

(*
  Title:      Singleton.thy
  Author:     Diego Marmsoler
*)
section "A Theory of Singletons"
textâ€¹
  In the following, we formalize the specification of the singleton pattern as described in~\cite{Marmsoler2018c}.
â€º
  
theory Singleton
imports DynamicArchitectures.Dynamic_Architecture_Calculus
begin
subsection Singletons
text â€¹
  In the following we formalize a variant of the Singleton pattern.
â€º
locale singleton = dynamic_component cmp active
    for active :: "'id â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and cmp :: "'id â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'cmp" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60) +
assumes alwaysActive: "â‹€k. âˆƒid. âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™"
    and unique: "âˆƒid. âˆ€k. âˆ€id'. (âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id = id')"
begin
subsubsection "Calculus Interpretation"
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] baIA}: @{thm baIA [no_vars]}
â€º
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] baIN1}: @{thm baIN1 [no_vars]}
â€º
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] baIN2}: @{thm baIN2 [no_vars]}
â€º

subsubsection "Architectural Guarantees"

definition "the_singleton â‰¡ THE id. âˆ€k. âˆ€id'. âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = id"

theorem ts_prop:
  fixes k::cnf
  shows "â‹€id. âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¹ id = the_singleton"
    and "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™"
proof -
  { fix id
    assume a1: "âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™"
  have "(THE id. âˆ€k. âˆ€id'. âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = id) = id"
  proof (rule the_equality)
    show "âˆ€k id'. âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = id"
    proof
      fix k show "âˆ€id'. âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = id"
      proof
        fix id' show "âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = id"
        proof
          assume "âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™"
          from unique have "âˆƒid. âˆ€k. âˆ€id'. (âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id = id')" .
          then obtain i'' where "âˆ€k. âˆ€id'. (âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ i'' = id')" by auto
            with â€¹âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™â€º have "id=i''" and "id'=i''" using a1 by auto
          thus "id' = id" by simp
        qed
      qed
    qed
  next
      fix i'' show "âˆ€k id'. âˆ¥id'âˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¶ id' = i'' âŸ¹ i'' = id" using a1 by auto
  qed
    hence "âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¹ id = the_singleton" by (simp add: the_singleton_def)
  } note g1 = this
  thus "â‹€id. âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âŸ¹ id = the_singleton" by simp

  from alwaysActive obtain id where "âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™" by blast
  with g1 have "id = the_singleton" by simp
  with â€¹âˆ¥idâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™â€º show "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™" by simp
qed
declare ts_prop(2)[simp]
  
lemma lNact_active[simp]:
  fixes cid t n
  shows "âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n"
  using lNact_active ts_prop(2) by auto

lemma lNxt_active[simp]:
  fixes cid t n
  shows "âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n"
by (simp add: nxtAct_active)
    
lemma baI[intro]:
  fixes t n a
  assumes "Ï† (Ïƒâ‡˜the_singletonâ‡™(t n))"
  shows "eval the_singleton t t' n [Ï†]â‡©b" using assms by (simp add: baIANow)
  
lemma baE[elim]:
  fixes t n a
  assumes "eval the_singleton t t' n [Ï†]â‡©b"                      
  shows "Ï† (Ïƒâ‡˜the_singletonâ‡™(t n))" using assms by (simp add: baEANow)

lemma evtE[elim]:
  fixes t id n a
  assumes "eval the_singleton t t' n (â—‡â‡©b Î³)"
  shows "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³"
proof -
  have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp
  with assms obtain n' where "n'â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" and "(âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™ âˆ§
    (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³)) âˆ¨
    Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§ eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³" using evtEA[of n "the_singleton" t] by blast
  moreover have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by simp
  ultimately have
    "âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³" by auto
  hence "eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³" by simp
  moreover from â€¹n'â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º have "n'â‰¥n" by (simp add: nxtAct_active)
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed
  
lemma globE[elim]:
  fixes t id n a
  assumes "eval the_singleton t t' n (â–¡â‡©b Î³)"
  shows "âˆ€n'â‰¥n. eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³"
proof
  fix n' show "n â‰¤ n' âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³"
  proof
    assume "nâ‰¤n'"
    hence "âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ n'" by simp
    moreover have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp
    ultimately show "eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³"
      using â€¹eval the_singleton t t' n (â–¡â‡©b Î³)â€º globEA by blast
  qed
qed

lemma untilI[intro]:
  fixes t::"nat â‡’ cnf"
    and t'::"nat â‡’ 'cmp"
    and n::nat
    and n'::nat
  assumes "n'â‰¥n"
    and "eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³"
    and "â‹€n''. âŸ¦nâ‰¤n''; n''<n'âŸ§ âŸ¹ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³'"
  shows "eval the_singleton t t' n (Î³' ğ”˜â‡©b Î³)"
proof -
  have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp 
  moreover from â€¹n'â‰¥nâ€º have "âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ n'" by simp
  moreover have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by simp
  moreover have
    "âˆƒn''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ§ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³ âˆ§
    (âˆ€n'''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n''' < âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n''â‡™ âŸ¶
      (âˆƒn''''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'''â‡™. n'''' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'''â‡™ âˆ§ eval the_singleton t t' n'''' Î³'))"
  proof -
    have "n'â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™" by simp
    moreover have "n' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™" by simp
    moreover from assms(3) have "(âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'' < âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶
      (âˆƒn'''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n''â‡™. n''' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n''â‡™ âˆ§ eval the_singleton t t' n''' Î³'))"
      by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³â€º by auto
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis using untilIA[of n "the_singleton" t n' t' Î³ Î³'] by blast
qed

lemma untilE[elim]:
  fixes t id n Î³' Î³
  assumes "eval the_singleton t t' n (Î³' ğ”˜â‡©b Î³)"
  shows "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³ âˆ§ (âˆ€n''â‰¥n. n'' < n' âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³')"
proof -
  have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp
  with â€¹eval the_singleton t t' n (Î³' ğ”˜â‡©b Î³)â€º obtain n' where "n'â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" and
   "(âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§
   (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³) âˆ§
   (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'' < âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³') âˆ¨
   Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§
   eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³ âˆ§ (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'' < n' âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³')"
  using untilEA[of n "the_singleton" t t' Î³' Î³] by auto
  moreover have "âˆ¥the_singletonâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by simp
  ultimately have
    "(âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³) âˆ§
    (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'' < âŸ¨the_singleton â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³')" by auto
  hence "eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³" and "(âˆ€n''â‰¥n. n'' < n' âŸ¶ eval the_singleton t t' n'' Î³')" by auto
  with â€¹eval the_singleton t t' n' Î³â€º â€¹n'â‰¥âŸ¨the_singleton â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º show ?thesis by auto
qed
end

end

Theory Publisher_Subscriber

(*
  Title:      Publisher_Subscriber.thy
  Author:     Diego Marmsoler
*)
section "A Theory of Publisher-Subscriber Architectures"
textâ€¹
  In the following, we formalize the specification of the publisher subscriber pattern as described in~\cite{Marmsoler2018c}.
â€º
  
theory Publisher_Subscriber
imports Singleton
begin

subsection "Subscriptions"

datatype 'evt subscription = sub 'evt | unsub 'evt

subsection "Publisher-Subscriber Architectures"

locale publisher_subscriber =
  pb: singleton pbactive pbcmp +
  sb: dynamic_component sbcmp sbactive
    for pbactive :: "'pid â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and pbcmp :: "'pid â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'PB" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60)
    and sbactive :: "'sid â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and sbcmp :: "'sid â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'SB" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60) +
  fixes pbsb :: "'PB â‡’ ('evt set) subscription set"
    and pbnt :: "'PB â‡’ ('evt Ã— 'msg)"             
    and sbnt :: "'SB â‡’ ('evt Ã— 'msg) set"
    and sbsb :: "'SB â‡’ ('evt set) subscription"
  assumes conn1: "â‹€k pid. âˆ¥pidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™
      âŸ¹ pbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜pidâ‡™(k)) = (â‹ƒsidâˆˆ{sid. âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {sbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(k))})"
    and conn2: "â‹€t n n'' sid pid E e m.
      âŸ¦t âˆˆ arch; âˆ¥pidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™; âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™; sub E = sbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n)); n''â‰¥ n; e âˆˆ E;
      âˆ„n' E'. n' â‰¥ n âˆ§ n' â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§
        unsub E' = sbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n')) âˆ§ e âˆˆ E';
      (e, m) = pbnt (Ïƒâ‡˜pidâ‡™(t n'')); âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™âŸ§
      âŸ¹ pbnt (Ïƒâ‡˜pidâ‡™(t n'')) âˆˆ sbnt (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n''))"
begin

subsubsection "Calculus Interpretation"
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] pb.baIA}: @{thm pb.baIA [no_vars]}
â€º
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] sb.baIA}: @{thm sb.baIA [no_vars]}
â€º
subsubsection "Results from Singleton"
abbreviation the_pb :: "'pid" where
"the_pb â‰¡ pb.the_singleton"

text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] pb.ts_prop(1)}: @{thm pb.ts_prop(1) [no_vars]}
â€º
text â€¹
\noindent
@{thm[source] pb.ts_prop(2)}: @{thm pb.ts_prop(2) [no_vars]}
â€º

subsubsection "Architectural Guarantees"
text â€¹
  The following theorem ensures that a subscriber indeed receives all messages associated with an event for which he is subscribed.
â€º
theorem msgDelivery:
  fixes t n n'' and sid::'sid and E e m
  assumes "t âˆˆ arch"
    and "âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
    and "sub E = sbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n))"
    and "n'' â‰¥ n"
    and "âˆ„n' E'. n' â‰¥ n âˆ§ n' â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§ unsub E' = sbsb(Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n'))
          âˆ§ e âˆˆ E'"
    and "e âˆˆ E"
    and "(e,m) = pbnt (Ïƒâ‡˜the_pbâ‡™(t n''))"
    and "âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™"
  shows "(e,m) âˆˆ sbnt (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(t n''))"
  using assms conn2 pb.ts_prop(2) by simp

text â€¹
  Since a publisher is actually a singleton, we can provide an alternative version of constraint @{thm[source] conn1}.
â€º
lemma conn1A:
  fixes k
  shows "pbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜the_pbâ‡™(k)) = (â‹ƒsidâˆˆ{sid. âˆ¥sidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {sbsb (Ïƒâ‡˜sidâ‡™(k))})"
  using conn1[OF pb.ts_prop(2)] .
end
  
end

Theory Blackboard

(*
  Title:      Blackboard.thy
  Author:     Diego Marmsoler
*)
section "A Theory of Blackboard Architectures"
textâ€¹
  In the following, we formalize the specification of the blackboard pattern as described in~\cite{Marmsoler2018c}.
â€º

theory Blackboard
imports Publisher_Subscriber
begin

subsection "Problems and Solutions"
text â€¹
  Blackboards work with problems and solutions for them.
â€º
typedecl PROB
consts sb :: "(PROB Ã— PROB) set"
axiomatization where sbWF: "wf sb"
typedecl SOL
consts solve:: "PROB â‡’ SOL"

subsection "Blackboard Architectures"
text â€¹
  In the following, we describe the locale for the blackboard pattern.
â€º
locale blackboard = publisher_subscriber bbactive bbcmp ksactive kscmp bbrp bbcs kscs ksrp
  for bbactive :: "'bid â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and bbcmp :: "'bid â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'BB" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60)
    and ksactive :: "'kid â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and kscmp :: "'kid â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'KS" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60)
    and bbrp :: "'BB â‡’ (PROB set) subscription set"
    and bbcs :: "'BB â‡’ (PROB Ã— SOL)"
    and kscs :: "'KS â‡’ (PROB Ã— SOL) set"
    and ksrp :: "'KS â‡’ (PROB set) subscription" +
  fixes bbns :: "'BB â‡’ (PROB Ã— SOL) set"
    and ksns :: "'KS â‡’ (PROB Ã— SOL)"
    and bbop :: "'BB â‡’ PROB"
    and ksop :: "'KS â‡’ PROB set"
    and prob :: "'kid â‡’ PROB"
  assumes
    ks1: "âˆ€p. âˆƒks. p=prob ks" â€• â€¹Component Parameterâ€º
    â€• â€¹Assertions about component behavior.â€º
    and bhvbb1: "â‹€t t' bId p s. âŸ¦t âˆˆ archâŸ§ âŸ¹ pb.eval bId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»bb. (p,s)âˆˆbbns bb]â‡©b
      âŸ¶â‡§b (â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. (p,s) = bbcs bb]â‡©b)))"
    and bhvbb2: "â‹€t t' bId P q. âŸ¦tâˆˆarchâŸ§ âŸ¹ pb.eval bId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»bb. sub P âˆˆ bbrp bb âˆ§ q âˆˆ P]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b
      (â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. q = bbop bb]â‡©b)))"
    and bhvbb3: "â‹€t t' bId p . âŸ¦tâˆˆarchâŸ§ âŸ¹ pb.eval bId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»bb. p = bbop(bb)]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b
      ([Î»bb. p=bbop(bb)]â‡©b ğ”šâ‡©b [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs(bb)]â‡©b)))"
    and bhvks1: "â‹€t t' kId p P. âŸ¦tâˆˆarch; p = prob kIdâŸ§ âŸ¹ sb.eval kId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b âˆ§â‡§b
      (âˆ€â‡©b q. ((sb.pred (qâˆˆP)) âŸ¶â‡§b (â—‡â‡©b ([Î»ks. (q,solve(q)) âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))))
      âŸ¶â‡§b (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p, solve p) = ksns ks]â‡©b)))"
    and bhvks2: "â‹€t t' kId p P q. âŸ¦t âˆˆ arch;p = prob kIdâŸ§ âŸ¹ sb.eval kId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b [Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks âˆ§ q âˆˆ P âŸ¶ (q,p) âˆˆ sb]â‡©b)"
    and bhvks3: "â‹€t t' kId p. âŸ¦tâˆˆarch;p = prob kIdâŸ§ âŸ¹ sb.eval kId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»ks. pâˆˆksop ks]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks)]â‡©b)))"
    and bhvks4: "â‹€t t' kId p P. âŸ¦tâˆˆarch; pâˆˆPâŸ§ âŸ¹ sb.eval kId t t' 0
      (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b
      ((Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (pâˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))) ğ”šâ‡©b
      [Î»ks. (p,solve p) âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b)))"

    â€• â€¹Assertions about component activation.â€º
    and actks:
      "â‹€t n kid p. âŸ¦t âˆˆ arch; âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™; p=prob kid; pâˆˆksop (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(t n))âŸ§
      âŸ¹ (âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§ (p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(t n')) âˆ§
      (âˆ€n''â‰¥n. n''<n' âŸ¶ âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™))
      âˆ¨ (âˆ€n'â‰¥n. (âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§ (Â¬(p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(t n')))))"

    â€• â€¹Assertions about connections.â€º
    and conn1: "â‹€k bid. âˆ¥bidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™
      âŸ¹ bbns (Ïƒâ‡˜bidâ‡™(k)) = (â‹ƒkidâˆˆ{kid. âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(k))})"
    and conn2: "â‹€k kid. âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™
      âŸ¹ ksop (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(k)) = (â‹ƒbidâˆˆ{bid. âˆ¥bidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜bidâ‡™(k))})"
begin
  notation sb.lNAct ("âŸ¨_ â‡ _âŸ©â‡˜_â‡™")
  notation sb.nxtAct ("âŸ¨_ â†’ _âŸ©â‡˜_â‡™")
  notation pb.lNAct ("âŸ¨_ â‡ _âŸ©â‡˜_â‡™")
  notation pb.nxtAct ("âŸ¨_ â†’ _âŸ©â‡˜_â‡™")

  subsubsection "Calculus Interpretation"
  text â€¹
  \noindent
  @{thm[source] pb.baIA}: @{thm pb.baIA [no_vars]}
â€º
  text â€¹
  \noindent
  @{thm[source] sb.baIA}: @{thm sb.baIA [no_vars]}
â€º

  subsubsection "Results from Singleton"
  abbreviation "the_bb â‰¡ the_pb"
  text â€¹
  \noindent
  @{thm[source] pb.ts_prop(1)}: @{thm pb.ts_prop(1) [no_vars]}
â€º
  text â€¹
  \noindent
  @{thm[source] pb.ts_prop(2)}: @{thm pb.ts_prop(2) [no_vars]}
â€º
  subsubsection "Results from Publisher Subscriber"
  text â€¹
	\noindent
	@{thm[source] msgDelivery}: @{thm msgDelivery [no_vars]}
â€º
  lemma conn2_bb:
    fixes k and kid::'kid
    assumes "âˆ¥kidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™"
    shows "bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(k))âˆˆksop (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(k))"
  proof -
    from assms have "ksop (Ïƒâ‡˜kidâ‡™(k)) = (â‹ƒbidâˆˆ{bid. âˆ¥bidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜bidâ‡™(k))})" using conn2 by simp
    moreover have "(â‹ƒbid.{bid. âˆ¥bidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™})={the_bb}" using pb.ts_prop(1) by auto
    hence "(â‹ƒbidâˆˆ{bid. âˆ¥bidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™}. {bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜bidâ‡™(k))}) = {bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(k))}" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed

  subsubsection "Knowledge Sources"
  text â€¹
    In the following we introduce an abbreviation for knowledge sources which are able to solve a specific problem.
â€º
  definition sKs:: "PROB â‡’ 'kid" where
    "sKs p â‰¡ (SOME kid. p = prob kid)"

  lemma sks_prob:
    "p = prob (sKs p)"
  using sKs_def someI_ex[of "Î»kid. p = prob kid"] ks1 by auto

  subsubsection "Architectural Guarantees"
  textâ€¹
    The following theorem verifies that a problem is eventually solved by the pattern even if no knowledge source exist which can solve the problem on its own.
    It assumes, however, that for every open sub problem, a corresponding knowledge source able to solve the problem will be eventually activated.
â€º
  lemma pSolved_Ind:
    fixes t and t'::"nat â‡’'BB" and p and t''::"nat â‡’'KS"
    assumes "tâˆˆarch" and
      "âˆ€n. (âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥sKs (bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n)))âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™)"
    shows
      "âˆ€n. (âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P) âŸ¶
        (âˆƒmâ‰¥n. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m)))" (*\eqref{eq:bb:g}*)
  â€• â€¹The proof is by well-founded induction over the subproblem relation @{term sb}â€º
  proof (rule wf_induct[where r=sb])
    â€• â€¹We first show that the subproblem relation is indeed well-founded ...â€º
    show "wf sb" by (simp add: sbWF)
  next
    â€• â€¹... then we show that a problem @{term p} is indeed solvedâ€º
    â€• â€¹if all its sub-problems @{term p'} are eventually solvedâ€º
    fix p assume indH: "âˆ€p'. (p', p) âˆˆ sb âŸ¶ (âˆ€n. (âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n)) âˆ§ p'âˆˆP)
      âŸ¶ (âˆƒmâ‰¥n. (p',solve(p')) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m))))"
    show "âˆ€n. (âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P)
      âŸ¶ (âˆƒmâ‰¥n. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m)))"
    proof
      fix nâ‡©0 show "(âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©0)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P) âŸ¶
      (âˆƒmâ‰¥nâ‡©0. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m)))"
      proof
        assume "âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©0)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P"
        moreover have "(âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©0)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P) âŸ¶ (âˆƒn'â‰¥nâ‡©0. p=bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n')))"
        proof
          assume "âˆƒP. sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©0)) âˆ§ p âˆˆ P"
          then obtain P where "sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©0))" and "p âˆˆ P" by auto
          hence "pb.eval the_bb t t' nâ‡©0 [Î»bb. sub P âˆˆ bbrp bb âˆ§ p âˆˆ P]â‡©b" using pb.baI by simp
          moreover from pb.globE[OF bhvbb2] have
            "pb.eval the_bb t t' nâ‡©0 ([Î»bb. sub P âˆˆ bbrp bb âˆ§ p âˆˆ P]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. p = bbop bb]â‡©b)"
            using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º by simp
          ultimately have "pb.eval the_bb t t' nâ‡©0 (â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. p = bbop bb]â‡©b)" using pb.impE by blast
          then obtain n' where "n'â‰¥nâ‡©0" and "pb.eval the_bb t t' n' [Î»bb. p = bbop bb]â‡©b"
            using pb.evtE by blast
          hence "p=bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n'))" using pb.baE by auto
          with â€¹n'â‰¥nâ‡©0â€º show "âˆƒn'â‰¥nâ‡©0. p=bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n'))" by auto
        qed
        ultimately obtain n where "nâ‰¥nâ‡©0" and "p=bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n))" by auto

        â€• â€¹Problem p is provided at the output of the blackboard until it is solvedâ€º
        â€• â€¹or forever...â€º
        from pb.globE[OF bhvbb3] have
          "pb.eval the_bb t t' n ([Î» bb. p = bbop(bb)]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b
          ([Î» bb. p=bbop(bb)]â‡©b ğ”šâ‡©b [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs(bb)]â‡©b))"
          using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º by auto
        moreover from â€¹p = bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n))â€º have
          "pb.eval the_bb t t' n [Î» bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b"
          using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.baI by simp
        ultimately have "pb.eval the_bb t t' n
          ([Î» bb. p=bbop(bb)]â‡©b ğ”šâ‡©b [Î» bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs(bb)]â‡©b)"
          using pb.impE by blast
        hence "pb.eval the_bb t t' n (([Î» bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b ğ”˜â‡©b
          [Î» bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs bb]â‡©b) âˆ¨â‡§b (â–¡â‡©b [Î» bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b))"
          using pb.wuntil_def by simp
        hence "pb.eval the_bb t t' n
          ([Î»bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b ğ”˜â‡©b [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs bb]â‡©b) âˆ¨
          (pb.eval the_bb t t' n (â–¡â‡©b [Î» bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b))"
          using pb.disjE by simp
        thus "âˆƒmâ‰¥nâ‡©0. (p,solve p) = bbcs(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m))"
        â€• â€¹We need to consider both cases, the case in which the problem is eventuallyâ€º
        â€• â€¹solved and the case in which the problem is always provided as an outputâ€º
        proof
          â€• â€¹First we consider the case in which the problem is eventually solved:â€º
          assume "pb.eval the_bb t t' n
            ([Î»bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b ğ”˜â‡©b [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs bb]â‡©b)"
          hence "âˆƒiâ‰¥n. (pb.eval the_bb t t' i
            [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs bb]â‡©b âˆ§
            (âˆ€kâ‰¥n. k<i âŸ¶ pb.eval the_bb t t' k [Î»bb. p = bbop bb]â‡©b))"
            using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.untilE by simp
          then obtain i where "iâ‰¥n" and
            "pb.eval the_bb t t' i [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs bb]â‡©b" by auto
          hence "(p,solve(p)) = bbcs(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t i))"
            using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.baEA by auto
          moreover from â€¹iâ‰¥nâ€º â€¹nâ‰¥nâ‡©0â€º have "iâ‰¥nâ‡©0" by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis by auto
        next
          â€• â€¹Now we consider the case in which p is always provided at the outputâ€º
          â€• â€¹of the blackboard:â€º
          assume "pb.eval the_bb t t' n
            (â–¡â‡©b [Î»bb. p=bbop bb]â‡©b)"
          hence "âˆ€n'â‰¥n. (pb.eval the_bb t t' n' [Î»bb. p = bbop bb]â‡©b)"
            using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.globE by auto
          hence outp: "âˆ€n'â‰¥n. (p = bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n')))"
            using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.baE by blast

          â€• â€¹thus, by assumption there exists a KS which is able to solve p and whichâ€º
          â€• â€¹is active at @{text n'}...â€º
          with assms(2) have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
          then obtain nâ‡©k where "nâ‡©kâ‰¥n" and "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™" by auto
          â€• â€¹... and get the problem as its input.â€º
          moreover from â€¹nâ‡©kâ‰¥nâ€º have "p = bbop (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©k))"
            using outp by simp
          ultimately have "pâˆˆksop(Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t nâ‡©k))" using conn2_bb[of "sKs p" "t nâ‡©k"] by simp

          â€• â€¹thus the ks will either solve the problem or not solve it andâ€º
          â€• â€¹be activated foreverâ€º
          hence "(âˆƒn'â‰¥nâ‡©k. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§
            (p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t n')) âˆ§
            (âˆ€n''â‰¥nâ‡©k. n''<n' âŸ¶ âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™)) âˆ¨
            (âˆ€n'â‰¥nâ‡©k. (âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§
            (Â¬(p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t n')))))"
            using â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º actks[of t "sKs p"] â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º sks_prob by simp
          thus ?thesis
          proof
            â€• â€¹if the ks solves itâ€º
            assume "âˆƒn'â‰¥nâ‡©k. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§ (p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™t n')
              âˆ§ (âˆ€n''â‰¥nâ‡©k. n'' < n' âŸ¶ âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™)"
            â€• â€¹it is forwarded to the blackboardâ€º
            then obtain nâ‡©s where "nâ‡©sâ‰¥nâ‡©k" and "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©sâ‡™"
              and "(p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™t nâ‡©s)" by auto
            moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™ = nâ‡©s"
              by (simp add: â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©sâ‡™â€º sb.nxtAct_active)
            ultimately have
              "(p,solve(p)) âˆˆ bbns (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)))"
              using conn1[OF pb.ts_prop(2)] â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©sâ‡™â€º by auto

            â€• â€¹finally, the blackboard will forward the solution which finishes the proof.â€º
            with bhvbb1 have "pb.eval the_bb t t' (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)
              (â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. (p, solve p) = bbcs bb]â‡©b)"
              using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.globE pb.impE[of the_bb t t'] by blast
            then obtain nâ‡©f where "nâ‡©fâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™" and
              "pb.eval the_bb t t' nâ‡©f [Î»bb. (p, solve p) = bbcs bb]â‡©b"
              using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.evtE[of t t' "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™"] by auto
            hence "(p, solve p) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©f))"
              using â€¹t âˆˆ archâ€º pb.baEA by auto
            moreover have "nâ‡©fâ‰¥nâ‡©0"
            proof -
              from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©k"
                using sb.nxtActI by blast
              with â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™ = nâ‡©sâ€º show ?thesis
                using â€¹nâ‡©fâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™â€º â€¹nâ‡©sâ‰¥nâ‡©kâ€º â€¹nâ‡©kâ‰¥nâ€º â€¹nâ‰¥nâ‡©0â€º by arith
            qed
            ultimately show ?thesis by auto
          next
            â€• â€¹otherwise, we derive a contradictionâ€º
            assume case_ass: "âˆ€n'â‰¥nâ‡©k. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âˆ§ Â¬(p, solve p) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™t n')"

            â€• â€¹first, the KS will eventually register for the subproblems P it requires to solve p...â€º
            from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
            moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©k" by simp
            ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©k
              ([Î»ks. pâˆˆksop ks]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b))"
              using sb.globEA[OF _ bhvks3[of t p "sKs p" t'']] â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º sks_prob by simp
            moreover have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©k [Î»ks. p âˆˆ ksop ks]â‡©b"
            proof -
              from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒn'â‰¥nâ‡©k. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
              moreover have "p âˆˆ ksop (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™)))"
              proof -
                from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™=nâ‡©k"
                  using sb.nxtAct_active by blast
                with â€¹pâˆˆksop(Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t nâ‡©k))â€º show ?thesis by simp
              qed
              ultimately show ?thesis using sb.baIA[of nâ‡©k "sKs p" t] by blast
            qed
            ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©k (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b)"
              using sb.impE by blast
            then obtain nâ‡©r where "nâ‡©râ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™" and
              "âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™ âˆ§
              (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™
              âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' [Î»ks. âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b) âˆ¨
              Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§
              sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r [Î»ks. âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b"
              using â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º sb.evtEA[of nâ‡©k "sKs p" t] by blast
            moreover from case_ass have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©k" using sb.nxtActI by blast
            with â€¹nâ‡©râ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "nâ‡©râ‰¥nâ‡©k" by arith
            hence "âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" using case_ass by auto
            hence "nâ‡©r â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" using sb.nxtActLe by simp
            moreover have "nâ‡©r â‰¥ âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" by simp
            ultimately have
              "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r [Î»ks. âˆƒP. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b" by blast
            with â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º obtain P where
              "sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))"
              using sb.baEA by blast
            hence "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r [Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b"
              using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º sb.baIA sks_prob by blast

            â€• â€¹the knowledgesource will eventually get a solution for each required subproblem:â€º
            moreover have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (âˆ€â‡©b p'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP) âŸ¶â‡§b
              (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b)))"
            proof -
              have "âˆ€p'. sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP) âŸ¶â‡§b
                (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
              proof
                â€• â€¹by induction hypothesis, the blackboard will eventually provide solutions for subproblemsâ€º
                fix p'
                have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP)) âŸ¶
                  (sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
                  (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
                proof
                  assume "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP))"
                  hence "p' âˆˆ P" using sb.predE by blast
                  thus "(sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
                  proof -
                    have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©r" by simp
                    moreover from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
                    ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r ([Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b
                      âŸ¶â‡§b ((Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))) ğ”šâ‡©b
                      [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
                      using sb.globEA[OF _ bhvks4[of t p' P "sKs p" t'']]
                      â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º â€¹p'âˆˆPâ€º by simp
                    with â€¹sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r [Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©bâ€º have
                      "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r ((Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b
                      [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))) ğ”šâ‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b)"
                      using sb.impE[of "(sKs p)" t t'' nâ‡©r "[Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b"] by blast
                    hence "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r ((Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b
                      [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))) ğ”˜â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b) âˆ¨
                      sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (â–¡â‡©b (Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b
                      [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))))" using sb.wuntil_def by auto
                    thus "(sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
                    proof
                      let ?Î³'="Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b ([Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b)))"
                      let ?Î³="[Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b"
                      assume "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (?Î³' ğ”˜â‡©b ?Î³)"
                      with â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º obtain n' where "n'â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" and
                        lass: "(âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™
                        âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' ?Î³) âˆ§
                        (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™. n'' < âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™
                        âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' ?Î³') âˆ¨
                        Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n' ?Î³ âˆ§
                        (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™. n'' < n' âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' ?Î³')"
                        using sb.untilEA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t t''] â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º by blast
                      thus "?thesis"
                      proof cases
                        assume "âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
                        with lass have "âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™
                          âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' ?Î³" by auto
                        moreover have "n'â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™" by simp
                        moreover have "n' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™"
                          using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º sb.nxtActLe by simp
                        ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n' ?Î³" by simp
                        moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n'" using â€¹nâ‡©r â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º
                        â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©râ€º â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n'â€º by linarith
                        ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º
                          â€¹n'â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â€º â€¹n' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â€º
                          sb.evtIA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t n' t'' ?Î³] by blast
                      next
                        assume "Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™)"
                        with lass have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n' ?Î³ âˆ§
                          (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™. n'' < n' âŸ¶ sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' ?Î³')" by auto
                        moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n'"
                          using â€¹nâ‡©r â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©râ€º
                          â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n'â€º by linarith
                        ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º â€¹Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥n'. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™)â€º
                            sb.evtIA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t n' t'' ?Î³] by blast
                      qed
                    next
                      assume cass: "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
                        (â–¡â‡©b (Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b))))"

                      have "sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™))) âˆ§
                        p' âˆˆ P âŸ¶ (p', p) âˆˆ sb"
                      proof -
                        have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º by auto
                        moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)" by simp
                        ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)
                          [Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks âˆ§ p' âˆˆ P âŸ¶ (p', p) âˆˆ sb]â‡©b"
                          using sb.globEA[OF _ bhvks2[of t p "sKs p" t'' P]] â€¹t âˆˆ archâ€º sks_prob by blast
                        moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have
                          "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)â‡™" using sb.nxtActI by blast
                        ultimately show ?thesis
                          using sb.baEANow[of "sKs p" t t'' "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™"] by simp
                      qed
                      with â€¹p' âˆˆ Pâ€º have "(p', p) âˆˆ sb"
                        using â€¹sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))â€º
                        sks_prob by simp
                      moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)â‡™"
                        using sb.nxtActI by blast
                        with â€¹sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))â€º
                          have "sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))"
                          using conn1A by auto
                      with â€¹ p' âˆˆ Pâ€º have "sub P âˆˆ bbrp (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)) âˆ§ p' âˆˆ P" by auto
                      ultimately obtain m where "mâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" and "(p', solve p') = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m))"
                        using indH by auto

                      â€• â€¹and due to the publisher subscriber property,â€º
                      â€• â€¹the knowledge source will receive themâ€º
                      moreover have
                        "âˆ„n P. âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n âˆ§ n â‰¤ m âˆ§ âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™ âˆ§
                        unsub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t n)) âˆ§ p' âˆˆ P"
                      proof
                        assume "âˆƒn P'. âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n âˆ§ n â‰¤ m âˆ§ âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™ âˆ§
                          unsub P' = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t n)) âˆ§ p' âˆˆ P'"
                        then obtain n P' where
                          "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" and "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n" and "n â‰¤ m" and
                          "unsub P' = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t n))" and "p' âˆˆ P'" by auto
                        hence "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. sb.pred (p'âˆˆP') âˆ§â‡§b
                          [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b)" by blast
                        moreover have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ n"
                          using â€¹nâ‡©r â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©râ€º
                          â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ nâ€º by linarith
                        with cass have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n (Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©b P'. (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP')
                          âˆ§â‡§b [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b)))"
                          using sb.globEA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t t''
                          "Â¬â‡§b (âˆƒâ‡©bP'. sb.pred (p' âˆˆ P') âˆ§â‡§b [Î»ks. unsub P' = ksrp ks]â‡©b)" n]
                          â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º by auto
                        ultimately show False using sb.negE by auto
                      qed
                      moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have
                        "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)â‡™" using sb.nxtActI by blast
                      moreover have "sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))"
                        using â€¹sub P = ksrp (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™)))â€º .
                      moreover from â€¹mâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ m" by simp
                      moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º
                        have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©r" using sb.nxtActI by blast
                      hence "mâ‰¥nâ‡©k" using â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ mâ€º â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™ â‰¤ nâ‡©râ€º
                        â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™ â‰¥ nâ‡©kâ€º by simp
                      with case_ass have "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t mâ‡™" by simp
                      ultimately have "(p', solve p') âˆˆ kscs (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t m))"
                        and "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t mâ‡™"
                        using â€¹t âˆˆ archâ€º msgDelivery[of t "sKs p" "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" P m p' "solve p'"]
                        â€¹p' âˆˆ Pâ€º by auto
                      hence "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' m [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b"
                        using sb.baIANow by simp
                      moreover have "m â‰¥ âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜mâ‡™" by simp
                      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t mâ‡™â€º have "m â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜mâ‡™"
                        using sb.nxtActLe by auto
                      moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have
                        "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" by simp
                      with â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ mâ€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¤ m" by arith
                      ultimately show "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
                        (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b)"
                        using â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º sb.evtIA by blast
                    qed
                  qed
                qed
                thus "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r (sb.pred (p'âˆˆP) âŸ¶â‡§b
                  (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p',solve p') âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))"
                  using sb.impI by auto
              qed
              thus ?thesis using sb.allI by blast
            qed

            â€• â€¹Thus, the knowlege source will eventually solve the problem at hand...â€º
            ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
              ([Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b âˆ§â‡§b
              (âˆ€â‡©b q. (sb.pred (q âˆˆ P) âŸ¶â‡§b â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (q, solve q) âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b)))"
              using sb.conjI by simp
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by blast
            hence "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
              (([Î»ks. sub P = ksrp ks]â‡©b âˆ§â‡§b
              (âˆ€â‡©b q. (sb.pred (q âˆˆ P) âŸ¶â‡§b
              â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (q, solve q) âˆˆ kscs ks]â‡©b))) âŸ¶â‡§b
              (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p, solve p) = ksns ks]â‡©b))" using â€¹t âˆˆ archâ€º
              sb.globEA[OF _ bhvks1[of t p "sKs p" t'' P]] sks_prob by simp
            ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©r
              (â—‡â‡©b [Î»ks. (p,solve(p))=ksns(ks)]â‡©b)"
              using sb.impE[of "sKs p" t t'' nâ‡©r] by blast

            â€• â€¹and forward it to the blackboardâ€º
            then obtain nâ‡©s where "nâ‡©sâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™" and
              "(âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™ âˆ§
              (âˆ€n''â‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™ âŸ¶
              sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' n'' [Î»ks. (p,solve(p))=ksns(ks)]â‡©b)) âˆ¨
              Â¬ (âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™) âˆ§
              sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©s [Î»ks. (p,solve(p))=ksns(ks)]â‡©b"
              using sb.evtEA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t] â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º by blast
            moreover from â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™ â‰¥ nâ‡©râ€º â€¹nâ‡©râ‰¥nâ‡©kâ€º â€¹nâ‡©sâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º
              have "nâ‡©sâ‰¥nâ‡©k" by arith
            with case_ass have "âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
            moreover have "nâ‡©sâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™" by simp
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have "nâ‡©s â‰¤ âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™"
              using sb.nxtActLe by simp
            ultimately have "sb.eval (sKs p) t t'' nâ‡©s [Î»ks. (p,solve(p))=ksns(ks)]â‡©b"
              using sb.evtEA[of nâ‡©r "sKs p" t] â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©r. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º by blast
            with â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º have
              "(p,solve(p)) = ksns (Ïƒâ‡˜sKs pâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)))"
              using sb.baEA[of nâ‡©s "sKs p" t t'' "Î»ks. (p, solve p) = ksns ks"] by auto
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒiâ‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™â€º
              have "âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)â‡™" using sb.nxtActI by simp
            ultimately have "(p,solve(p)) âˆˆ bbns (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)))"
              using conn1[OF pb.ts_prop(2)[of "t (âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™)"]] by auto
            hence "pb.eval the_bb t t' âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™ [Î»bb. (p,solve(p)) âˆˆ bbns bb]â‡©b"
              using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.baI by simp

            â€• â€¹finally, the blackboard will forward the solution which finishes the proof.â€º
            with bhvbb1 have "pb.eval the_bb t t' âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™
              (â—‡â‡©b [Î»bb. (p, solve p) = bbcs bb]â‡©b)"
              using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.globE pb.impE[of the_bb t t'] by blast
            then obtain nâ‡©f where "nâ‡©fâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™" and
              "pb.eval the_bb t t' nâ‡©f [Î»bb. (p, solve p) = bbcs bb]â‡©b"
              using â€¹tâˆˆarchâ€º pb.evtE[of t t' "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™"] by auto
            hence "(p, solve p) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t nâ‡©f))"
              using â€¹t âˆˆ archâ€º pb.baEA by auto
            moreover have "nâ‡©fâ‰¥nâ‡©0"
            proof -
              from â€¹âˆƒn'''â‰¥nâ‡©s. âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t n'''â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s"
                using sb.nxtActLe by simp
              moreover from â€¹nâ‡©kâ‰¥nâ€º and â€¹âˆ¥sKs pâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©k"
                using sb.nxtActI by blast
              ultimately show ?thesis
                using â€¹nâ‡©fâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™â€º â€¹nâ‡©sâ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â€º
                â€¹âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©râ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©râ€º â€¹nâ‡©râ‰¥âŸ¨sKs p â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©kâ‡™â€º â€¹nâ‡©kâ‰¥nâ€º â€¹nâ‰¥nâ‡©0â€º by arith
            qed
            ultimately show ?thesis by auto
          qed
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed

  theorem pSolved:
    fixes t and t'::"nat â‡’'BB" and t''::"nat â‡’'KS"
    assumes "tâˆˆarch" and
      "âˆ€n. (âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥sKs (bbop(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n)))âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™)"
    shows
      "âˆ€n. (âˆ€P. (sub P âˆˆ bbrp(Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t n))
        âŸ¶ (âˆ€p âˆˆ P. (âˆƒmâ‰¥n. (p,solve(p)) = bbcs (Ïƒâ‡˜the_bbâ‡™(t m))))))"
    using assms pSolved_Ind by blast
end

end

Theory Auxiliary

section "Some Auxiliary Results"

theory Auxiliary imports Main
begin

lemma disjE3: "P âˆ¨ Q âˆ¨ R âŸ¹ (P âŸ¹ S) âŸ¹ (Q âŸ¹ S) âŸ¹ (R âŸ¹ S) âŸ¹ S" by auto

lemma ge_induct[consumes 1, case_names step]:
  fixes i::nat and j::nat and P::"nat â‡’ bool"
  shows "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ (â‹€n. i â‰¤ n âŸ¹ ((âˆ€m â‰¥ i.  m<n âŸ¶ P m) âŸ¹ P n)) âŸ¹ P j"
proof -
  assume a0: "i â‰¤ j" and a1: "(â‹€n. i â‰¤ n âŸ¹ ((âˆ€m â‰¥ i.  m<n âŸ¶ P m) âŸ¹ P n))"
  have "(â‹€n. âˆ€m<n. i â‰¤ m âŸ¶ P m âŸ¹ i â‰¤ n âŸ¶ P n)"
  proof
    fix n
    assume a2: "âˆ€m<n. i â‰¤ m âŸ¶ P m"
    show "i â‰¤ n âŸ¹ P n"
    proof -
      assume "i â‰¤ n"
      with a1 have "(âˆ€m â‰¥ i.  m<n âŸ¶ P m) âŸ¹ P n" by simp
      moreover from a2 have "âˆ€m â‰¥ i.  m<n âŸ¶ P m" by simp
      ultimately show "P n" by simp
    qed
  qed
  with nat_less_induct[of "Î»j. i â‰¤ j âŸ¶ P j" j] have "i â‰¤ j âŸ¶ P j" .
  with a0 show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma my_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step]:
  fixes P::"natâ‡’bool"
assumes less: "i â‰¤ j"
    and base: "P j"
    and step: "â‹€n. i â‰¤ n âŸ¹ n < j âŸ¹ (âˆ€n'>n. n'â‰¤j âŸ¶ P n') âŸ¹ P n"
  shows "P i"
proof cases
  assume "j=0"
  thus ?thesis using less base by simp
next
  assume "Â¬ j=0"
  have "j - (j - i) â‰¥ i âŸ¶ P (j - (j - i))"
  proof (rule less_induct[of "Î»n::nat. j-n â‰¥ i âŸ¶ P (j-n)" "j-i"])
    fix x assume asmp: "â‹€y. y < x âŸ¹ i â‰¤ j - y âŸ¶ P (j - y)"
    show "i â‰¤ j - x âŸ¶ P (j - x)"
    proof cases
      assume "x=0"
      with base show ?thesis by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ x=0"
      with â€¹j â‰  0â€º have "j - x < j" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof
        assume "i â‰¤ j - x"
        moreover have "âˆ€n'>j-x. n'â‰¤j âŸ¶ P n'"
        proof
          fix n'
          show "n'>j-x âŸ¶ n'â‰¤j âŸ¶ P n'"
          proof (rule HOL.impI[OF HOL.impI])
            assume "j - x < n'" and "n' â‰¤ j"
            hence "j - n' < x" by simp
            moreover from â€¹i â‰¤ j - xâ€º â€¹j - x < n'â€º have "i â‰¤ n'" using le_less_trans less_imp_le_nat by blast
            with â€¹n' â‰¤ jâ€º have "i â‰¤ j - (j - n')" by simp
            ultimately have  "P (j - (j - n'))" using asmp by simp
            moreover from â€¹n' â‰¤ jâ€º have "j - (j - n') = n'" by simp
            ultimately show "P n'" by simp
          qed
        qed
        ultimately show "P (j - x)" using â€¹j-x<jâ€º step[of "j-x"] by simp
      qed
    qed
  qed
  moreover from less have "j - (j - i) = i" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma Greatest_ex_le_nat: assumes "âˆƒk. P k âˆ§ (âˆ€k'. P k' âŸ¶ k' â‰¤ k)" shows "Â¬(âˆƒn'>Greatest P. P n')"
  by (metis Greatest_equality assms less_le_not_le)

lemma cardEx: assumes "finite A" and "finite B" and "card A > card B" shows "âˆƒxâˆˆA. Â¬ xâˆˆB"
proof cases
  assume "A âŠ† B"
  with assms have "card Aâ‰¤card B" using card_mono by blast
  with assms have False by simp
  thus ?thesis by simp
next
  assume "Â¬ A âŠ† B" 
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma cardshift: "card {i::nat. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)} = card {i. i>(n + n'') âˆ§ i â‰¤ (n' + n'') âˆ§ p i}"
proof -
  let ?f="Î»i. i+n''"
  have "bij_betw ?f {i::nat. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)} {i. i>(n + n'') âˆ§ i â‰¤ (n' + n'') âˆ§ p i}"
  proof (rule bij_betwI')
    fix x y assume "x âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)}" and "y âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)}"
    show "(x + n'' = y + n'') = (x = y)" by simp
  next
    fix x::nat assume "x âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)}"
    hence "n<x" and "x â‰¤ n'" and "p(n''+x)" by auto
    moreover have "n''+x=x+n''" by simp
    ultimately have "n + n'' < x + n''" and "x + n'' â‰¤ n' + n''" and "p (x + n'')" by auto
    thus "x + n'' âˆˆ {i. n + n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' + n'' âˆ§ p i}" by auto
  next
    fix y::nat assume "y âˆˆ {i. n + n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' + n'' âˆ§ p i}"
    hence "n+n''<y" and "yâ‰¤n'+n''" and "p y" by auto
    then obtain x where "x=y-n''" by simp
    with â€¹n+n''<yâ€º have "y=x+n''" by simp
    moreover from â€¹x=y-n''â€º â€¹n+n''<yâ€º have "x>n" by simp
    moreover from â€¹x=y-n''â€º â€¹yâ‰¤n'+n''â€º have "xâ‰¤n'" by simp
    moreover from â€¹y=x+n''â€º have "y=n''+x" by simp
    with â€¹p yâ€º have "p (n'' + x)" by simp
    ultimately show "âˆƒxâˆˆ{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p (n'' + i)}. y = x + n''" by auto
  qed
  thus ?thesis using bij_betw_same_card by auto
qed

end

Theory RF_LTL

section "Relative Frequency LTL"

theory RF_LTL
  imports Main "HOL-Library.Sublist" Auxiliary DynamicArchitectures.Dynamic_Architecture_Calculus
begin

type_synonym 's seq = "nat â‡’ 's"

abbreviation "ccard n n' p â‰¡ card {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}"

lemma ccard_same:
  assumes "Â¬ p (Suc n')"
  shows "ccard n n' p = ccard n (Suc n') p"
proof -
  have "{i. i > n âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i} = {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}"
  proof
    show "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i} âŠ† {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}"
    proof
      fix x assume "x âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i}"
      hence "n<x" and "xâ‰¤Suc n'" and "p x" by auto
      with assms (1) have "xâ‰ Suc n'" by auto
      with â€¹xâ‰¤Suc n'â€º have "x â‰¤ n'" by simp
      with â€¹n<xâ€º â€¹p xâ€º show "x âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}" by simp
    qed
  next
    show "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i} âŠ† {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i}" by auto
  qed
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma ccard_zero[simp]:
  fixes n::nat
  shows "ccard n n p = 0"
  by auto

lemma ccard_inc:
  assumes "p (Suc n')"
    and "n' â‰¥ n"
  shows "ccard n (Suc n') p = Suc (ccard n n' p)"
proof -
  let ?A = "{i. i > n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}"
  have "finite ?A" by simp
  moreover have "Suc n' âˆ‰ ?A" by simp
  ultimately have "card (insert (Suc n') ?A) = Suc (card ?A)" using card_insert_disjoint[of ?A] by simp
  moreover have "insert (Suc n') ?A = {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ (Suc n') âˆ§ p i}"
  proof
    show "insert (Suc n') ?A âŠ† {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i}"
    proof
      fix x assume "x âˆˆ insert (Suc n') {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i}"
      hence "x=Suc n' âˆ¨ n < x âˆ§ x â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p x" by simp
      thus "x âˆˆ {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i}"
      proof
        assume "x = Suc n'"
        with assms (1) assms (2) show ?thesis by simp
      next
        assume "n < x âˆ§ x â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p x"
        thus ?thesis by simp
      qed
    qed
  next
    show "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ p i} âŠ† insert (Suc n') ?A" by auto
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma ccard_mono:
  assumes "n'â‰¥n"
  shows "n''â‰¥n' âŸ¹ ccard n (n''::nat) p â‰¥ ccard n n' p"
proof (induction n'' rule: dec_induct)
  case base
  then show ?case ..
next
  case (step n'')
  then show ?case
  proof cases
    assume "p (Suc n'')"
    moreover from step.hyps assms have "nâ‰¤n''" by simp
    ultimately have "ccard n (Suc n'') p = Suc (ccard n n'' p)" using ccard_inc[of p n'' n] by simp
    also have "â€¦ â‰¥ ccard n n' p" using step.IH by simp
    finally show ?case .
  next
    assume "Â¬ p (Suc n'')"
    moreover from step.hyps assms have "nâ‰¤n''" by simp
    ultimately have "ccard n (Suc n'') p = ccard n n'' p" using ccard_same[of p n'' n] by simp
    also have "â€¦ â‰¥ ccard n n' p" using step.IH by simp
    finally show ?case by simp
  qed
qed

lemma ccard_ub[simp]:
  "ccard n n' p â‰¤ Suc n' - n"
proof -
  have "{i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ p i} âŠ† {i. iâ‰¥n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'}" by auto
  hence "ccard n n' p â‰¤ card {i. iâ‰¥n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'}" by (simp add: card_mono)
  moreover have "{i. iâ‰¥n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'} = {n..n'}" by auto
  hence "card {i. iâ‰¥n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'} = Suc n' - n" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma ccard_sum:
  fixes n::nat
  assumes "n'â‰¥n''"
    and "n''â‰¥n"
  shows "ccard n n' P = ccard n n'' P + ccard n'' n' P"
proof -
  have "ccard n n' P = card {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
  moreover have "{i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i} =
    {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P i} âˆª {i. i>n'' âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" (is "?LHS = ?RHS")
  proof
    show "?LHS âŠ† ?RHS" by auto
  next
    show "?RHS âŠ† ?LHS"
    proof
      fix x
      assume "xâˆˆ?RHS"
      hence "x>n âˆ§ x â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P x âˆ¨ x>n'' âˆ§ x â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P x" by auto
      thus "xâˆˆ?LHS"
      proof
        assume "n < x âˆ§ x â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P x"
        with assms show ?thesis by simp
      next
        assume "n'' < x âˆ§ x â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P x"
        with assms show ?thesis by simp
      qed
    qed
  qed
  hence "card ?LHS = card ?RHS" by simp
  ultimately have "ccard n n' P = card ?RHS" by simp
  moreover have "card ?RHS = card {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P i} + card {i. i>n'' âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}"
  proof (rule card_Un_disjoint)
    show "finite {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
    show "finite {i. n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
    show "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P i} âˆ© {i. n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i} = {}" by auto
  qed
  moreover have "ccard n n'' P = card {i. i>n âˆ§ i â‰¤ n'' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
  moreover have "ccard n'' n' P= card {i. i>n'' âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma ccard_ex:
  fixes n::nat
  shows "câ‰¥1 âŸ¹ c < ccard n n'' P âŸ¹ âˆƒn'<n''. n'>n âˆ§ ccard n n' P = c"
proof (induction c rule: dec_induct)
  let ?l = "LEAST i::nat. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"
  case base
  moreover have "ccard n n'' P â‰¤ Suc (card {i. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i})"
  proof -
    from â€¹ccard n n'' P > 1â€º have "n''>n" using less_le_trans by force
    then obtain n' where "Suc n' = n''" and "Suc n' â‰¥ n" by (metis lessE less_imp_le_nat)
    moreover have "{i. n < i âˆ§ i < Suc n' âˆ§ P i} = {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" by auto
    hence "card {i. n < i âˆ§ i < Suc n' âˆ§ P i} = card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
    moreover have "card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n' âˆ§ P i} â‰¤ Suc (card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i})"
    proof cases
      assume "P (Suc n')"
      moreover from â€¹n''>nâ€º â€¹Suc n'=n''â€º have "n'â‰¥n" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using ccard_inc[of P n' n] by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ P (Suc n')"
      moreover from â€¹n''>nâ€º â€¹Suc n'=n''â€º have "n'â‰¥n" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using ccard_same[of P n' n] by simp
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "card {i. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i} â‰¥ 1" by simp
  hence "{i. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i} â‰  {}" by fastforce
  hence "âˆƒi. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i" by auto
  hence "?l>n" and "?l<n''" and "P ?l" using LeastI_ex[of "Î»i::nat. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by auto
  moreover have "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i} = {?l}"
  proof
    show "{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i} âŠ† {?l}"
    proof
      fix i
      assume "iâˆˆ{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}"
      hence "n < i" and "i â‰¤ ?l" and "P i" by auto
      with â€¹âˆƒi. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P iâ€º have "i=?l"
        using Least_le[of "Î»i. n < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by (meson antisym le_less_trans)
      thus "iâˆˆ{?l}" by simp
    qed
  next
    show "{?l} âŠ† {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}"
    proof
      fix i
      assume "iâˆˆ{?l}"
      hence "i=?l" by simp
      with â€¹?l>nâ€º â€¹?l<n''â€º â€¹P ?lâ€º show "iâˆˆ{i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}" by simp
    qed
  qed
  hence "ccard n ?l P = 1" by simp
  ultimately show ?case by auto
next
  case (step c)
  moreover from step.prems have "Suc c<ccard n n'' P" by simp
  ultimately obtain n' where "n'<n''" and "n < n'" and "ccard n n' P = c" by auto
  hence "ccard n n'' P = ccard n n' P + ccard n' n'' P" using ccard_sum[of n' n'' n] by simp
  with â€¹Suc c<ccard n n'' Pâ€º â€¹ccard n n' P = câ€º have "ccard n' n'' P>1" by simp
  moreover have "ccard n' n'' P â‰¤ Suc (card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i})"
  proof -
    from â€¹ccard n' n'' P > 1â€º have "n''>n'" using less_le_trans by force
    then obtain n''' where "Suc n''' = n''" and "Suc n''' â‰¥ n'" by (metis lessE less_imp_le_nat)
    moreover have "{i. n' < i âˆ§ i < Suc n''' âˆ§ P i} = {i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' âˆ§ P i}" by auto
    hence "card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i < Suc n''' âˆ§ P i} = card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' âˆ§ P i}" by simp
    moreover have "card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ Suc n''' âˆ§ P i} â‰¤ Suc (card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' âˆ§ P i})"
    proof cases
      assume "P (Suc n''')"
      moreover from â€¹n''>n'â€º â€¹Suc n'''=n''â€º have "n'''â‰¥n'" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using ccard_inc[of P n''' n'] by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ P (Suc n''')"
      moreover from â€¹n''>n'â€º â€¹Suc n'''=n''â€º have "n'''â‰¥n'" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using ccard_same[of P n''' n'] by simp
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "card {i. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i} â‰¥ 1" by simp
  hence "{i. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i} â‰  {}" by fastforce
  hence "âˆƒi. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i" by auto
  let ?l = "LEAST i::nat. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"
  from â€¹âˆƒi. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P iâ€º have "n' < ?l"
    using LeastI_ex[of "Î»i::nat. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by auto
  with â€¹n < n'â€º have "ccard n ?l P = ccard n n' P + ccard n' ?l P" using ccard_sum[of n' ?l n] by simp
  moreover have "{i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i} = {?l}"
  proof
    show "{i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i} âŠ† {?l}"
    proof
      fix i
      assume "iâˆˆ{i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}"
      hence "n' < i" and "i â‰¤ ?l" and "P i" by auto
      with â€¹âˆƒi. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P iâ€º have "i=?l"
        using Least_le[of "Î»i. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by (meson antisym le_less_trans)
      thus "iâˆˆ{?l}" by simp
    qed
  next
    show "{?l} âŠ† {i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}"
    proof
      fix i
      assume "iâˆˆ{?l}"
      hence "i=?l" by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒi. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P iâ€º have "?l<n''" and "P ?l"
        using LeastI_ex[of "Î»i. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by auto
      ultimately show "iâˆˆ{i. n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i}" using â€¹?l>n'â€º by simp
    qed
  qed
  hence "ccard n' ?l P = 1" by simp
  ultimately have "card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ ?l âˆ§ P i} = Suc c" using â€¹ccard n n' P = câ€º by simp
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒi. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P iâ€º have "n' < ?l" and "?l < n''" and "P ?l"
    using LeastI_ex[of "Î»i::nat. n' < i âˆ§ i < n'' âˆ§ P i"] by auto
  with â€¹n < n'â€º have "n<?l" and "?l<n''" by auto
  ultimately show ?case by auto
qed

lemma ccard_freq:
  assumes "(n'::nat)â‰¥n"
    and "ccard n n' P > ccard n n' Q + cnf"
  shows "âˆƒn' n''. ccard n' n'' P > cnf âˆ§ ccard n' n'' Q â‰¤ cnf"
proof cases
  assume "cnf = 0"
  with assms(2) have "ccard n n' P > ccard n n' Q" by simp
  hence "card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ P i}>card {i. n < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n' âˆ§ Q i}" (is "card ?LHS>card ?RHS")
    by simp
  then obtain i where "iâˆˆ?LHS" and "Â¬ i âˆˆ ?RHS" and "i>0" using cardEx[of ?LHS ?RHS] by auto
  hence "P i" and "Â¬ Q i" by auto
  with â€¹i>0â€º obtain n'' where "P (Suc n'')" and "Â¬Q (Suc n'')" using gr0_implies_Suc by auto
  hence "ccard n'' (Suc n'') P = 1" using ccard_inc by auto
  with â€¹cnf = 0â€º have "ccard n'' (Suc n'') P > cnf" by simp
  moreover from â€¹Â¬Q (Suc n'')â€º have "ccard n'' (Suc n'') Q = 0" using ccard_same[of Q n'' n''] by auto
  with â€¹cnf = 0â€º have "ccard n'' (Suc n'') Q â‰¤ cnf" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
next
  assume "Â¬ cnf = 0"
  show ?thesis
  proof (rule ccontr)
    assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn' n''. ccard n' n'' P > cnf âˆ§ ccard n' n'' Q â‰¤ cnf)"
    hence hyp: "âˆ€n' n''. ccard n' n'' Q â‰¤ cnf âŸ¶ ccard n' n'' P â‰¤ cnf"
      using leI less_imp_le_nat by blast
    show False
    proof cases
      assume "ccard n n' Q â‰¤ cnf"
      with hyp have "ccard n n' P â‰¤ cnf" by simp
      with assms show False by simp
    next
      let ?gcond="Î»n''. n''â‰¥n âˆ§ n''â‰¤n' âˆ§ (âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf)"
      let ?g= "GREATEST n''. ?gcond n''"
      assume "Â¬ ccard n n' Q â‰¤ cnf"
      hence "ccard n n' Q > cnf" by simp
      hence "âˆƒn''. ?gcond n''"
      proof -
        from â€¹ccard n n' Q > cnfâ€º â€¹Â¬cnf=0â€º obtain n'' where "n''>n" and "n''â‰¤n'" and "ccard n n'' Q = cnf"
          using ccard_ex[of cnf n n' Q ] by auto
        moreover from â€¹ccard n n'' Q = cnfâ€º have "âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf" by auto
        ultimately show ?thesis using less_imp_le_nat by blast
      qed
      moreover have "âˆ€n''>n'. Â¬ ?gcond n''" by simp
      ultimately have gex: "âˆƒn''. ?gcond n'' âˆ§ (âˆ€n'''. ?gcond n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤n'')"
        using boundedGreatest[of ?gcond _ n'] by blast
      hence "âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n ?g Q = x * cnf" and "?g â‰¥ n" using GreatestI_ex_nat[of ?gcond] by auto
      moreover {fix n''
      have "n''â‰¥n âŸ¹ âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf âŸ¹ ccard n n'' P â‰¤ ccard n n'' Q"
      proof (induction n'' rule: ge_induct)
        case (step n')
        from step.prems obtain x where "xâ‰¥1" and cas: "ccard n n' Q = x * cnf" by auto
        then show ?case
        proof cases
          assume "x=1"
          with cas have "ccard n n' Q = cnf" by simp
          with hyp have "ccard n n' P â‰¤ cnf" by simp
          with â€¹ccard n n' Q = cnfâ€º show ?thesis by simp
        next
          assume "Â¬x=1"
          with â€¹xâ‰¥1â€º have "x>1" by simp
          hence "x-1 â‰¥ 1" by simp
          moreover from â€¹cnfâ‰ 0â€º â€¹x-1 â‰¥ 1â€º have "(x-1) * cnf < x * cnf âˆ§ (x - 1) * cnf â‰  0" by auto
          with â€¹x-1 â‰¥ 1â€º â€¹cnfâ‰ 0â€ºâ€¹ccard n n' Q = x * cnfâ€º obtain n''
            where "n''>n" and "n''<n'" and "ccard n n'' Q = (x-1) * cnf"
            using ccard_ex[of "(x-1)*cnf" n n' Q ] by auto
          ultimately have "âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf" and "n''â‰¥n" by auto
          with â€¹n''â‰¥nâ€º â€¹n''<n'â€º have "ccard n n'' P â‰¤ ccard n n'' Q" using step.IH by simp
          moreover have "ccard n'' n' Q = cnf"
          proof -
            from â€¹x-1 â‰¥ 1â€º have "x*cnf = ((x-1) * cnf) + cnf"
              using semiring_normalization_rules(2)[of "(x - 1)" cnf] by simp
            with â€¹ccard n n'' Q = (x-1) * cnfâ€º â€¹ccard n n' Q = x * cnfâ€º
            have "ccard n n' Q = ccard n n'' Q + cnf" by simp
            moreover from â€¹n''â‰¥nâ€º â€¹n''<n'â€º have "ccard n n' Q = ccard n n'' Q + ccard n'' n' Q"
              using ccard_sum[of n'' n' n] by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by simp
          qed
          moreover from â€¹ccard n'' n' Q = cnfâ€º have "ccard n'' n' P â‰¤ cnf" using hyp by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹n''â‰¥nâ€º â€¹n''<n'â€º ccard_sum[of n'' n' n] by simp
        qed
      qed } note geq = this
      ultimately have "ccard n ?g P â‰¤ ccard n ?g Q" by simp
      moreover have "ccard ?g n' P â‰¤ cnf"
      proof (rule ccontr)
        assume "Â¬ ccard ?g n' P â‰¤ cnf"
        hence "ccard ?g n' P > cnf" by simp
        have "ccard ?g n' Q > cnf"
        proof (rule ccontr)
          assume "Â¬ccard ?g n' Q > cnf"
          hence "ccard ?g n' Q â‰¤ cnf" by simp
          with â€¹ccard ?g n' P > cnfâ€º show False
            using â€¹Â¬ (âˆƒn' n''. ccard n' n'' P > cnf âˆ§ ccard n' n'' Q â‰¤ cnf)â€º by simp
        qed
        with â€¹Â¬ cnf=0â€º obtain n'' where "n''>?g" and "n''<n'" and "ccard ?g n'' Q = cnf"
          using ccard_ex[of cnf ?g n' Q] by auto
        moreover have "âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf"
        proof -
          from â€¹âˆƒxâ‰¥1. ccard n ?g Q = x * cnfâ€º obtain x where "xâ‰¥1" and "ccard n ?g Q = x * cnf" by auto
          from â€¹n''>?gâ€º â€¹?gâ‰¥nâ€º have "ccard n n'' Q = ccard n ?g Q + ccard ?g n'' Q"
            using ccard_sum[of ?g n'' n Q] by simp
          with â€¹ccard n ?g Q = x * cnfâ€º have "ccard n n'' Q = x * cnf + ccard ?g n'' Q" by simp
          with â€¹ccard ?g n'' Q = cnfâ€º have "ccard n n'' Q = Suc x * cnf" by simp
          thus ?thesis by auto
        qed
        moreover from â€¹n''>?gâ€º â€¹?gâ‰¥nâ€º have "n''â‰¥n" by simp
        ultimately have "âˆƒn''>?g. ?gcond n''" by auto
        moreover from gex have "âˆ€n'''. ?gcond n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?g" using Greatest_le_nat[of ?gcond] by auto
        ultimately show False by auto
      qed
      moreover from gex have "n'â‰¥?g" using GreatestI_ex_nat[of ?gcond] by auto
      ultimately have "ccard n n' Pâ‰¤ccard n n' Q + cnf" using ccard_sum[of ?g n' n] using â€¹?g â‰¥ nâ€º by simp
      with assms show False by simp
    qed
  qed
qed

locale honest =
  fixes bc:: "('a list) seq"
    and n::nat
  assumes growth: "n'â‰ 0 âŸ¹ n'â‰¤n âŸ¹ bc n' = bc (n'-1) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc n' = bc (n' - 1) @ b)"
begin
end

locale dishonest =
  fixes bc:: "('a list) seq"
    and mining::"bool seq"
  assumes growth: "â‹€n::nat. prefix (bc (Suc n)) (bc n) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb::'a. bc (Suc n) = bc n @ [b]) âˆ§ mining (Suc n)"
begin

lemma prefix_save:
  assumes "prefix sbc (bc n')"
    and "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'' âŸ¶ length (bc n''') â‰¥ length sbc"
  shows "n''â‰¥n' âŸ¹ prefix sbc (bc n'')"
proof (induction n'' rule: dec_induct)
  case base
  with assms(1) show ?case by simp
next
  case (step n)
  from growth[of n] show ?case
  proof
    assume "prefix (bc (Suc n)) (bc n)"
    moreover from step.hyps have "length (bc (Suc n)) â‰¥ length sbc" using assms(2) by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH using prefix_length_prefix by auto
  next
    assume "(âˆƒb. bc (Suc n) = bc n @ [b]) âˆ§ mining (Suc n)"
    with step.IH show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

theorem prefix_length:
  assumes "prefix sbc (bc n')" and "Â¬ prefix sbc (bc n'')" and "n'â‰¤n''"
  shows "âˆƒn'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'' âˆ§ length (bc n''') < length sbc"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'' âˆ§ length (bc n''') < length sbc)"
  hence "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'' âŸ¶ length (bc n''') â‰¥ length sbc" by auto
  with assms have "prefix sbc (bc n'')" using prefix_save[of sbc n' n''] by simp
  with assms (2) show False by simp
qed

theorem grow_mining:
  assumes "length (bc n) < length (bc (Suc n))"
  shows "mining (Suc n)"
  using assms growth leD prefix_length_le by blast

lemma length_suc_length:
  "length (bc (Suc n)) â‰¤ Suc (length (bc n))"
  by (metis eq_iff growth le_SucI length_append_singleton prefix_length_le)

end

locale dishonest_growth =
  fixes bc:: "nat seq"
    and mining:: "nat â‡’ bool"
  assumes as1: "â‹€n::nat. bc (Suc n) â‰¤ Suc (bc n)"
    and as2: "â‹€n::nat. bc (Suc n) > bc n âŸ¹ mining (Suc n)"
begin

end

sublocale dishonest âŠ† dishonest_growth "Î»n. length (bc n)" using grow_mining length_suc_length by unfold_locales auto

context dishonest_growth
begin
  theorem ccard_diff_lgth:
    "n'â‰¥n âŸ¹ ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n) â‰¥ (bc n' - bc n)"
  proof (induction n' rule: dec_induct)
    case base
    then show ?case by simp
    next
    case (step n')
    from as1 have "bc (Suc n') < Suc (bc n') âˆ¨ bc (Suc n') = Suc (bc n')"
      using le_neq_implies_less by blast
    then show ?case
    proof
      assume "bc (Suc n') < Suc (bc n')"
      hence "bc (Suc n') - bc n â‰¤ bc n' - bc n" by simp
      moreover from step.hyps have "ccard n (Suc n') (Î»n. mining n) â‰¥ ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n)"
        using ccard_mono[of n n' "Suc n'"] by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH by simp
    next
      assume "bc (Suc n') = Suc (bc n')"
      hence "bc (Suc n') - bc n â‰¤ Suc (bc n' - bc n)" by simp
      moreover from â€¹bc (Suc n') = Suc (bc n')â€º have "mining (Suc n')" using as2 by simp
      with step.hyps have "ccard n (Suc n') (Î»n. mining n) â‰¥ Suc (ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n))"
        using ccard_inc by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH by simp
    qed
  qed
end

locale honest_growth =
  fixes bc:: "nat seq"
    and mining:: "nat â‡’ bool"
    and init:: nat
  assumes as1: "â‹€n::nat. bc (Suc n) â‰¥ bc n"
    and as2: "â‹€n::nat. mining (Suc n) âŸ¹ bc (Suc n) > bc n"
begin
  lemma grow_mono: "n'â‰¥nâŸ¹bc n'â‰¥bc n"
  proof (induction n' rule: dec_induct)
    case base
    then show ?case by simp
  next
    case (step n')
    then show ?case using as1[of n'] by simp
  qed

  theorem ccard_diff_lgth:
    shows "n'â‰¥n âŸ¹ bc n' - bc n â‰¥ ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n)"
  proof (induction n' rule: dec_induct)
    case base
    then show ?case by simp
  next
    case (step n')
    then show ?case
    proof cases
      assume "mining (Suc n')"
      with as2 have "bc (Suc n') > bc n'" by simp
      moreover from step.hyps have "bc n'â‰¥bc n" using grow_mono by simp
      ultimately have "bc (Suc n') - bc n > bc n' - bc n" by simp
      moreover from as1 have "bc (Suc n') - bc n â‰¥ bc n' - bc n" by (simp add: diff_le_mono)
      moreover from â€¹mining (Suc n')â€º step.hyps
        have "ccard n (Suc n') (Î»n. mining n) â‰¤ Suc (ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n))"
        using ccard_inc by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ mining (Suc n')"
      hence "ccard n (Suc n') (Î»n. mining n) â‰¤ (ccard n n' (Î»n. mining n))" using ccard_same by simp
      moreover from as1 have "bc (Suc n') - bc n â‰¥ bc n' - bc n" by (simp add: diff_le_mono)
      ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH by simp
    qed
  qed
end

locale bounded_growth = hg: honest_growth hbc hmining + dg: dishonest_growth dbc dmining
    for hbc:: "nat seq"
    and dbc:: "nat seq"
    and hmining:: "nat â‡’ bool"
    and dmining:: "nat â‡’ bool"
    and sbc::nat
    and cnf::nat +
  assumes fair: "â‹€n n'. ccard n n' (Î»n. dmining n) > cnf âŸ¹ ccard n n' (Î»n. hmining n) > cnf"
    and a2: "hbc 0 â‰¥ sbc+cnf"
    and a3: "dbc 0 < sbc"
begin

theorem hn_upper_bound: shows "dbc n < hbc n"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "Â¬ dbc n < hbc n"
  hence "dbc n â‰¥ hbc n" by simp
  moreover from a2 a3 have "hbc 0 > dbc 0 + cnf" by simp
  moreover have "hbc nâ‰¥hbc 0" using hg.grow_mono by simp
  ultimately have "dbc n - dbc 0 > hbc n - hbc 0 + cnf" by simp
  moreover have "ccard 0 n (Î»n. hmining n) â‰¤ hbc n - hbc 0" using hg.ccard_diff_lgth by simp
  moreover have "dbc n - dbc 0 â‰¤ ccard 0 n (Î»n. dmining n)" using dg.ccard_diff_lgth by simp
  ultimately have "ccard 0 n (Î»n. dmining n) > ccard 0 n (Î»n. hmining n) + cnf" by simp
  hence "âˆƒn' n''. ccard n' n'' (Î»n. dmining n) > cnf âˆ§ ccard n' n'' (Î»n. hmining n) â‰¤ cnf"
    using ccard_freq by blast
  with fair show False using leD by blast
qed

end

end

Theory Blockchain

(*
  Title:      Blockchain.thy
  Author:     Diego Marmsoler
*)
section "Blockchain Architectures"

theory Blockchain imports Auxiliary DynamicArchitectures.Dynamic_Architecture_Calculus RF_LTL
begin

subsection "Blockchains"
text â€¹
  A blockchain itself is modeled as a simple list.
â€º

type_synonym 'a BC = "'a list"

abbreviation max_cond:: "('a BC) set â‡’ 'a BC â‡’ bool"
  where "max_cond B b â‰¡ b âˆˆ B âˆ§ (âˆ€b'âˆˆB. length b' â‰¤ length b)"

no_syntax 
  "_MAX1"     :: "pttrns â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b"           ("(3MAX _./ _)" [0, 10] 10)
  "_MAX"      :: "pttrn â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b"  ("(3MAX _:_./ _)" [0, 0, 10] 10)
  "_MAX1"     :: "pttrns â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b"           ("(3MAX _./ _)" [0, 10] 10)
  "_MAX"      :: "pttrn â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b"  ("(3MAX _âˆˆ_./ _)" [0, 0, 10] 10)

definition MAX:: "('a BC) set â‡’ 'a BC"
  where "MAX B = (SOME b. max_cond B b)"

lemma max_ex:
  fixes XS::"('a BC) set"
  assumes "XS â‰  {}"
    and "finite XS"
  shows "âˆƒxsâˆˆXS. (âˆ€ysâˆˆXS. length ys â‰¤ length xs)"
proof (rule Finite_Set.finite_ne_induct)
  show "finite XS" using assms by simp
next
  from assms show "XS â‰  {}" by simp
next
  fix x::"'a BC"
  show "âˆƒxsâˆˆ{x}. âˆ€ysâˆˆ{x}. length ys â‰¤ length xs" by simp
next
  fix zs::"'a BC" and F::"('a BC) set"
  assume "finite F" and "F â‰  {}" and "zs âˆ‰ F" and "âˆƒxsâˆˆF. âˆ€ysâˆˆF. length ys â‰¤ length xs"
  then obtain xs where "xsâˆˆF" and "âˆ€ysâˆˆF. length ys â‰¤ length xs" by auto
  show "âˆƒxsâˆˆinsert zs F. âˆ€ysâˆˆinsert zs F. length ys â‰¤ length xs"
  proof (cases)
    assume "length zs â‰¥ length xs"
    with â€¹âˆ€ysâˆˆF. length ys â‰¤ length xsâ€º show ?thesis by auto
  next
    assume "Â¬ length zs â‰¥ length xs"
    hence "length zs â‰¤ length xs" by simp
    with â€¹xs âˆˆ Fâ€º show ?thesis using â€¹âˆ€ysâˆˆF. length ys â‰¤ length xsâ€º by auto
  qed
qed

lemma max_prop:
  fixes XS::"('a BC) set"
  assumes "XS â‰  {}"
    and "finite XS"
  shows "MAX XS âˆˆ XS"
    and "âˆ€b'âˆˆXS. length b' â‰¤ length (MAX XS)"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒxsâˆˆXS. âˆ€ysâˆˆXS. length ys â‰¤ length xs" using max_ex[of XS] by auto
  with MAX_def[of XS] show "MAX XS âˆˆ XS" and "âˆ€b'âˆˆXS. length b' â‰¤ length (MAX XS)"
    using someI_ex[of "Î»b. b âˆˆ XS âˆ§ (âˆ€b'âˆˆXS. length b' â‰¤ length b)"] by auto
qed

lemma max_less:
  fixes b::"'a BC" and b'::"'a BC" and B::"('a BC) set"
  assumes "bâˆˆB"
    and "finite B"
    and "length b > length b'"
  shows "length (MAX B) > length b'"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒxsâˆˆB. âˆ€ysâˆˆB. length ys â‰¤ length xs" using max_ex[of B] by auto
  with MAX_def[of B] have "âˆ€b'âˆˆB. length b' â‰¤ length (MAX B)"
    using someI_ex[of "Î»b. b âˆˆ B âˆ§ (âˆ€b'âˆˆB. length b' â‰¤ length b)"] by auto
  with â€¹bâˆˆBâ€º have "length b â‰¤ length (MAX B)" by simp
  with â€¹length b > length b'â€º show ?thesis by simp
qed

subsection "Blockchain Architectures"
text â€¹
  In the following we describe the locale for blockchain architectures.
â€º

locale Blockchain = dynamic_component cmp active
  for active :: "'nid â‡’ cnf â‡’ bool" ("âˆ¥_âˆ¥â‡˜_â‡™" [0,110]60)
    and cmp :: "'nid â‡’ cnf â‡’ 'ND" ("Ïƒâ‡˜_â‡™(_)" [0,110]60) +
  fixes pin :: "'ND â‡’ ('nid BC) set"
    and pout :: "'ND â‡’ 'nid BC"
    and bc :: "'ND â‡’ 'nid BC"
    and mining :: "'ND â‡’ bool"
    and honest :: "'nid â‡’ bool"
    and actHn :: "cnf â‡’ 'nid set"
    and actDn :: "cnf â‡’ 'nid set"
    and PoW:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ nat"
    and hmining:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
    and dmining:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
    and cb:: nat
  defines "actHn k â‰¡ {nid. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âˆ§ honest nid}"
    and "actDn k â‰¡ {nid. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ honest nid}"
    and "PoW t n â‰¡ (LEAST x. âˆ€nidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n))) â‰¤ x)"
    and "hmining t â‰¡ (Î»n. âˆƒnidâˆˆactHn (t n). mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)))"
    and "dmining t â‰¡ (Î»n. âˆƒnidâˆˆactDn (t n). mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)))"
  assumes consensus: "â‹€nid t t' bc'::('nid BC). âŸ¦honest nidâŸ§ âŸ¹ eval nid t t' 0
    (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»nd. bc' = (if (âˆƒbâˆˆpin nd. length b > length (bc nd)) then (MAX (pin nd)) else (bc nd))]â‡©b
      âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [Î»nd.(Â¬ mining nd âˆ§ bc nd = bc' âˆ¨ mining nd âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc nd = bc' @ [b]))]â‡©b))"
    and attacker: "â‹€nid t t' bc'. âŸ¦Â¬ honest nidâŸ§ âŸ¹ eval nid t t' 0
    (â–¡â‡©b ([Î»nd. bc' = (SOME b. b âˆˆ (pin nd âˆª {bc nd}))]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b
      â—‹â‡©b [Î»nd.(Â¬ mining nd âˆ§ prefix (bc nd) bc' âˆ¨ mining nd âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc nd = bc' @ [b]))]â‡©b))"
    and forward: "â‹€nid t t'. eval nid t t' 0 (â–¡â‡©b [Î»nd. pout nd = bc nd]â‡©b)"
    â€• â€¹At each time point a node will forward its blockchain to the networkâ€º
    and init: "â‹€nid t t'. eval nid t t' 0 [Î»nd. bc nd=[]]â‡©b"
    and conn: "â‹€k nid. âŸ¦âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜kâ‡™; honest nidâŸ§
      âŸ¹ pin (cmp nid k) = (â‹ƒnid'âˆˆactHn k. {pout (cmp nid' k)})"
    and act: "â‹€t n::nat. finite {nid::'nid. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™}"
    and actHn: "â‹€t n::nat. âˆƒnid. honest nid âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™"
    and fair: "â‹€n n'. ccard n n' (dmining t) > cb âŸ¹ ccard n n' (hmining t) > cb"
    and closed: "â‹€t nid b n::nat. âŸ¦âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™; b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n))âŸ§ âŸ¹ âˆƒnid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™ âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n)) = b"
    and mine: "â‹€t nid n::nat. âŸ¦honest nid; âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™; mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))âŸ§ âŸ¹ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
begin

lemma init_model:
  assumes "Â¬ (âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n')"
    and "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  shows "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n) = []"
proof -
  from assms(2) have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
  with init have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™) = []" using baEA[of 0 nid t] by blast
  moreover from assms have "n=âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™" using nxtAct_eq by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma fwd_bc:
  fixes nid and t::"nat â‡’ cnf" and t'::"nat â‡’ 'ND"
  assumes "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  shows "pout (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)"
  using assms forward globEANow[THEN baEANow[of nid t t' n]] by blast

lemma finite_input:
  fixes t n nid
  assumes "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  defines "dep nid' â‰¡ pout (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n))"
  shows "finite (pin (cmp nid (t n)))"
proof -
  have "finite {nid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™}" using act by auto
  moreover have "pin (cmp nid (t n)) âŠ† dep ` {nid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™}"
  proof
    fix x assume "x âˆˆ pin (cmp nid (t n))"
    show "x âˆˆ dep ` {nid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™}"
    proof -
      from assms obtain nid' where "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" and "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n)) = x"
        using closed â€¹x âˆˆ pin (cmp nid (t n))â€º by blast
      hence "pout (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n)) = x" using fwd_bc by auto
      hence "x=dep nid'" using dep_def by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "nid' âˆˆ {nid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™}" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using image_eqI by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis using finite_surj by metis
qed

lemma nempty_input:
  fixes t n nid
  assumes "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
    and "honest nid"
  shows "pin (cmp nid (t n))â‰ {}" using conn[of nid "t n"] act assms actHn_def by auto

lemma onlyone:
  assumes "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
  shows "âˆƒ!i. âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ i âˆ§ i < âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
proof
  show "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ < âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
    by (metis assms dynamic_component.nxtActI latestAct_prop(1) latestAct_prop(2) less_le_trans order_refl)
next
  fix i
  show "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ i âˆ§ i < âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™ âŸ¹ i = âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
    by (metis latestActless(1) leI le_less_Suc_eq le_less_trans nxtActI order_refl)
qed

subsubsection "Component Behavior"

lemma bhv_hn_ex:
  fixes t and t'::"nat â‡’ 'ND" and tid
  assumes "honest tid"
    and "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
  shows "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) =
    Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§
    (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])"
proof -
  let ?cond = "Î»nd. MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) =
    (if (âˆƒbâˆˆpin nd. length b > length (bc nd)) then (MAX (pin nd)) else (bc nd))"
  let ?check = "Î»nd. Â¬ mining nd âˆ§ bc nd = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨ mining nd âˆ§
    (âˆƒb. bc nd = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])"
  from â€¹honest tidâ€º have "eval tid t t' 0 (â–¡â‡©b([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b))"
    using consensus[of tid _ _ "MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"] by simp
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
  moreover have "âŸ¨tid â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ ([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)"
    using globEA[of 0 tid t t' "([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)" "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by fastforce
  moreover have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?cond]â‡©b"
  proof (rule baIA)
