    from â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º show "âˆƒiâ‰¥âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" using latestAct_prop(1) by blast
    from assms(3) assms(4) show "?cond (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™)" using latestActNxt by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ (â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)"
    using impE[of tid t t' _ "[?cond]â‡©b" "â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b"] by simp
  moreover have "âˆƒi>âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
  proof -
    from assms have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" using latestActNxtAct by simp
    with assms(3) have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using latestActNxt by simp
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"  using nxtActI by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  moreover from assms have "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
    using latestActNxtAct by (simp add: order.strict_implies_order)
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒ!i. âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ i âˆ§ i < âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
    using onlyone by simp
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?check]â‡©b"
    using nxtEA1[of tid t "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" t' "[?check]â‡©b" "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by simp
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using nxtActI by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis using baEANow[of tid t t' "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" ?check] by simp
qed

lemma bhv_hn_in:
  fixes t and t'::"nat â‡’ 'ND" and tid
  assumes "honest tid"
    and "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "Â¬ (âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
  shows "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b])"
proof -
  let ?cond = "Î»nd. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = (if (âˆƒbâˆˆpin nd. length b > length (bc nd)) then (MAX (pin nd)) else (bc nd))"
  let ?check = "Î»nd. Â¬ mining nd âˆ§ bc nd = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨ mining nd âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc nd = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b])"
  from â€¹honest tidâ€º have "eval tid t t' 0 ((â–¡â‡©b([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)))"
    using consensus[of tid _ _ "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)"] by simp
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
  moreover have "âŸ¨tid â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ ([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)"
    using globEA[of 0 tid t t' "[?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b" "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by fastforce
  moreover have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?cond]â‡©b"
  proof (rule baIA)
    from â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º show "âˆƒiâ‰¥âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" using latestAct_prop(1) by blast
    from assms(3) assms(4) show "?cond (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™)" using latestActNxt by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ (â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)"
    using impE[of tid t t' _ "[?cond]â‡©b" "â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b"] by simp
  moreover have "âˆƒi>âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
  proof -
    from assms have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" using latestActNxtAct by simp
    with assms(3) have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using latestActNxt by simp
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"  using nxtActI by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  moreover from assms have "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
    using latestActNxtAct by (simp add: order.strict_implies_order)
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒ!i. âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ i âˆ§ i < âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
    using onlyone by simp
  ultimately have "eval tid t t' âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?check]â‡©b"
    using nxtEA1[of tid t "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" t' "[?check]â‡©b" "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by simp
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using nxtActI by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis using baEANow[of tid t t' "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" ?check] by simp
qed

lemma bhv_hn_context:
  assumes "honest tid"
      and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
      and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    shows "âˆƒnid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™ âˆ§ (mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b]) âˆ¨
      Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
proof cases
  assume casmp: "âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
  moreover from assms(2) have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  moreover from assms(3) have "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])"
    using assms(1) bhv_hn_ex by auto
  moreover from assms(2) have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n" using nxtAct_active by simp
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])" by simp
  moreover from assms(2) have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n" using nxtAct_active by simp
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])" by simp
  moreover have "Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)"
  proof -
    from â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
    hence "finite (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™(t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))" using finite_input[of tid t "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by simp
    moreover from casmp obtain b where "b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)" and "length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using max_prop(1) by auto
  qed
  with â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º  obtain nid where "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
    and "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))" using
    closed[of tid t "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" "MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"] latestAct_prop(1) by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
next
  assume "Â¬ (âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
  moreover from assms(2) have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  moreover from assms(3) have "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b])"
    using assms(1) bhv_hn_in[of tid n t] by auto
  moreover from assms(2) have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n" using nxtAct_active by simp
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b])" by simp
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond tid t n n'â€º have "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
    using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma bhv_dn:
  fixes t and t'::"nat â‡’ 'ND" and uid
  assumes "Â¬ honest uid"
    and "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
    and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
  shows "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) (SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)})
         âˆ¨ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = (SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}) @ [b])"
proof -
  let ?cond = "Î»nd. (SOME b. b âˆˆ (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)})) = (SOME b. b âˆˆ pin nd âˆª {bc nd})"
  let ?check = "Î»nd. Â¬ mining nd âˆ§ prefix (bc nd) (SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)})
    âˆ¨ mining nd âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc nd = (SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}) @ [b])"
  from â€¹Â¬ honest uidâ€º have "eval uid t t' 0 ((â–¡â‡©b([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)))"
    using attacker[of uid _ _ "(SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)})"]
    by simp
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒiâ‰¥0. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" by auto
  moreover have "âŸ¨uid â‡ tâŸ©â‡˜0â‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
  ultimately have "eval uid t t' âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ ([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b[?check]â‡©b)"
    using globEA[of 0 uid t t' "([?cond]â‡©b âŸ¶â‡§b â—‹â‡©b[?check]â‡©b)" "âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by fastforce
  moreover have "eval uid t t' âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?cond]â‡©b"
  proof (rule baIA)
    from â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º show "âˆƒiâ‰¥âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™" using latestAct_prop(1) by blast
    with assms(3) show "?cond (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™)" using latestActNxt by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "eval uid t t' âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ (â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b)"
    using impE[of uid t t' _ "[?cond]â‡©b" "â—‹â‡©b [?check]â‡©b"] by simp
  moreover have "âˆƒi>âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
  proof -
    from assms have "âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" using latestActNxtAct by simp
    with assms(3) have "âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™>âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using latestActNxt by simp
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"  using nxtActI by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  moreover from assms have "âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
    using latestActNxtAct by (simp add: order.strict_implies_order)
  moreover from assms have "âˆƒ!i. âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ i âˆ§ i < âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t iâ‡™"
    using onlyone by simp
  ultimately have "eval uid t t' âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ [?check]â‡©b"
    using nxtEA1[of uid t "âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" t' "[?check]â‡©b" "âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by simp
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using nxtActI by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis using baEANow[of uid t t' "âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" ?check] by simp
qed

lemma bhv_dn_context:
  assumes "Â¬ honest uid"
      and "âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
      and "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
  shows "âˆƒnid'. âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™ âˆ§ (mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n)) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b]))
  âˆ¨ Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n)) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
proof -
  let ?bc="SOME b. b âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}"
  have bc_ex: "?bc âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨ ?bc âˆˆ {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}"
  proof -
    have "âˆƒb. bâˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}" by auto
    hence "?bc âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆª {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}" using someI_ex by simp
    thus ?thesis by auto
  qed

  from assms(2) have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  moreover from assms(3) have "âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
  ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) ?bc âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = ?bc @ [b])"
    using bhv_dn[of uid n t] assms(1) by simp
  moreover from assms(2) have "âŸ¨uid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ = n" using nxtAct_active by simp
  ultimately have casmp: "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n)) ?bc âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) = ?bc @ [b])" by simp

  from bc_ex have "?bc âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨ ?bc âˆˆ {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}" .
  thus ?thesis
  proof
    assume "?bc âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)"
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'<n. âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
    ultimately obtain nid where "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™" and "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = ?bc"
      using closed by blast
    with casmp have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n)) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
      mining (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t n) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])" by simp
    with â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º show ?thesis by auto
  next
    assume "?bc âˆˆ {bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)}"
    hence "?bc = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜uidâ‡™t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)" by simp
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond uid t n n'â€º have "âˆ¥uidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨uid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
      using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis using casmp by auto
  qed
qed

subsubsection "Maximal Honest Blockchains"

abbreviation mbc_cond:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid â‡’ bool"
  where "mbc_cond t n nid â‰¡ nidâˆˆactHn (t n) âˆ§ (âˆ€nid'âˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n))) â‰¤ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n))))"

lemma mbc_ex:
  fixes t n
  shows "âˆƒx. mbc_cond t n x"
proof -
  let ?ALL="{b. âˆƒnidâˆˆactHn (t n). b = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n))}"
  have "MAX ?ALL âˆˆ ?ALL"
  proof (rule max_prop)
    from actHn have "actHn (t n) â‰  {}" using actHn_def by blast
    thus "?ALLâ‰ {}" by auto
    from act have "finite (actHn (t n))" using actHn_def by simp
    thus "finite ?ALL" by simp
  qed
  then obtain nid where "nid âˆˆ actHn (t n) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)) = MAX ?ALL" by auto
  moreover have "âˆ€nid'âˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n))) â‰¤ length (MAX ?ALL)"
  proof
    fix nid
    assume "nid âˆˆ actHn (t n)"
    hence "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)) âˆˆ ?ALL" by auto
    moreover have "âˆ€b'âˆˆ?ALL. length b' â‰¤ length (MAX ?ALL)"
    proof (rule max_prop)
      from â€¹bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)) âˆˆ ?ALLâ€º show "?ALLâ‰ {}" by auto
      from act have "finite (actHn (t n))" using actHn_def by simp
      thus "finite ?ALL" by simp
    qed
    ultimately show "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) â‰¤ length (Blockchain.MAX {b. âˆƒnidâˆˆactHn (t n). b = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)})" by simp
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

definition MBC:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid"
  where "MBC t n = (SOME b. mbc_cond t n b)"

lemma mbc_prop[simp]:
  shows "mbc_cond t n (MBC t n)"
  using someI_ex[OF mbc_ex] MBC_def by simp

subsubsection "Honest Proof of Work"
text â€¹
  An important construction is the maximal proof of work available in the honest community.
  The construction was already introduces in the locale itself since it was used to express some of the locale assumptions.
â€º

abbreviation pow_cond:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
  where "pow_cond t n n' â‰¡ âˆ€nidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n))) â‰¤ n'"

lemma pow_ex:
  fixes t n
  shows "pow_cond t n (length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™(t n))))"
    and "âˆ€x'. pow_cond t n x' âŸ¶ x'â‰¥length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™(t n)))"
  using mbc_prop by auto

lemma pow_prop:
  "pow_cond t n (PoW t n)"
proof -
  from pow_ex have "pow_cond t n (LEAST x. pow_cond t n x)" using LeastI_ex[of "pow_cond t n"] by blast
  thus ?thesis using PoW_def by simp
qed 

lemma pow_eq:
  fixes n
  assumes "âˆƒtidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™(t n))) = x"
    and "âˆ€tidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™(t n))) â‰¤ x"
  shows "PoW t n = x"
proof -
  have "(LEAST x. pow_cond t n x) = x"
  proof (rule Least_equality)
    from assms(2) show "âˆ€nidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) â‰¤ x" by simp
  next
    fix y
    assume "âˆ€nidâˆˆactHn (t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) â‰¤ y"
    thus "x â‰¤ y" using assms(1) by auto
  qed
  with PoW_def show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma pow_mbc:
  shows "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™t n)) = PoW t n"
  by (metis mbc_prop pow_eq)

lemma pow_less:
  fixes t n nid
  assumes "pow_cond t n x"
  shows "PoW t n â‰¤ x"
proof -
  from pow_ex assms have "(LEAST x. pow_cond t n x) â‰¤ x" using Least_le[of "pow_cond t n"] by blast
  thus ?thesis using PoW_def by simp
qed

lemma pow_le_max:
  assumes "honest tid"
    and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  shows "PoW t n â‰¤ length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)))"
proof -
  from mbc_prop have "honest (MBC t n)" and "âˆ¥MBC t nâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" using actHn_def by auto
  hence "pout (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™t n) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™t n)"
    using forward globEANow[THEN baEANow[of "MBC t n" t t' n "Î»nd. pout nd = bc nd"]] by auto
  with assms â€¹âˆ¥MBC t nâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º â€¹honest (MBC t n)â€º have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™t n) âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)"
    using conn actHn_def by auto
  moreover from assms (2) have "finite (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n))" using finite_input[of tid t n] by simp
  ultimately have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜MBC t nâ‡™t n)) â‰¤ length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)))"
    using max_prop(2) by auto
  with pow_mbc show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma pow_ge_lgth:
  assumes "honest tid"
    and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  shows "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)) â‰¤ PoW t n"
proof -
  from assms have "tid âˆˆ actHn (t n)" using actHn_def by simp
  thus ?thesis using pow_prop by simp
qed

lemma pow_le_lgth:
  assumes "honest tid"
    and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
    and "Â¬(âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)))"
  shows "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)) â‰¥ PoW t n"
proof -
  from assms (3) have "âˆ€bâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n). length b â‰¤ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n))" by auto
  moreover from assms nempty_input[of tid t n] finite_input[of tid t n]
  have "MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)) âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)" using max_prop(1)[of "pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)"] by simp
  ultimately have "length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n))) â‰¤ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n))" by simp
  moreover from assms have "PoW t n â‰¤ length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n)))" using pow_le_max by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma pow_mono:
  shows "n'â‰¥n âŸ¹ PoW t n' â‰¥ PoW t n"
proof (induction n' rule: dec_induct)
  case base
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (step n')
  hence "PoW t n â‰¤ PoW t n'" by simp
  moreover have "PoW t (Suc n') â‰¥ PoW t n'"
  proof -
    from actHn obtain tid where "honest tid" and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" and "âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™" by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof cases
      assume "âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n'). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n'))"
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc n'â‡™ = Suc n'"
        using nxtAct_active by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc n'â‡™ = n'"
        using latestAct_prop(2) latestActless le_less_Suc_eq by blast
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆƒn''<Suc n'. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™" by blast
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º have "âˆƒn''â‰¥Suc n'. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™" by auto
      ultimately have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n')) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n')) âˆ¨
        (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n')) = Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n')) @ b)"
        using â€¹honest tidâ€º bhv_hn_ex[of tid "Suc n'" t] by auto
      hence "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n'))) â‰¥ length (Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n')))" by auto
      moreover from â€¹honest tidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º
        have "length (Blockchain.MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n'))) â‰¥ PoW t n'" using pow_le_max by simp
      ultimately have "PoW t n' â‰¤ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n')))" by simp
      moreover from â€¹honest tidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º
        have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n'))) â‰¤ PoW t (Suc n')" using pow_ge_lgth by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    next
      assume asmp: "Â¬(âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n'). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n')))"
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨tid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc n'â‡™ = Suc n'"
        using nxtAct_active by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨tid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc n'â‡™ = n'"
        using latestAct_prop(2) latestActless le_less_Suc_eq by blast
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º have "âˆƒn''<Suc n'. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™" by blast
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º have "âˆƒn''â‰¥Suc n'. âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n''â‡™" by auto
      ultimately have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n')) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n') âˆ¨
        (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n')) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n') @ b)"
        using â€¹honest tidâ€º bhv_hn_in[of tid "Suc n'" t] by auto
      hence "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n'))) â‰¥ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n'))" by auto
      moreover from â€¹honest tidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™â€º asmp have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t n')) â‰¥ PoW t n'"
        using pow_le_lgth by simp
      moreover from â€¹honest tidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥tidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n')â‡™â€º
      have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜tidâ‡™t (Suc n'))) â‰¤ PoW t (Suc n')" using pow_ge_lgth by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?case by auto
qed

lemma pow_equals:
  assumes "PoW t n = PoW t n'"
  and "n'â‰¥n"
  and "n''â‰¥n"
  and "n''â‰¤n'"
shows "PoW t n = PoW t n''" by (metis pow_mono assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) eq_iff)

lemma pow_mining_suc:
    assumes "hmining t (Suc n)"
    shows "PoW t n < PoW t (Suc n)"
proof -
  from assms obtain nid where "nidâˆˆactHn (t (Suc n))" and "mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))"
    using hmining_def by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof cases
    assume asmp: "(âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™)))"
    moreover from â€¹nidâˆˆactHn (t (Suc n))â€º have "honest nid" and "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™"
      using actHn_def by auto
    moreover from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))â€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
      using mine by simp
    hence "âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t (Suc n) n'" by auto
    ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™)) @ [b])" using bhv_hn_ex[of nid "Suc n"] by auto
    moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = Suc n" using nxtAct_active by simp
    moreover have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = n"
    proof (rule latestActEq)
      from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º show "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp
      show "Â¬ (âˆƒn''>n. n'' < Suc n âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™)" by simp
      show "n < Suc n" by simp
    qed
    hence "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = n" using latestAct_def by simp
    ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) @ [b])" by simp
    with â€¹mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))â€º
      have "âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) @ [b]" by auto
    moreover from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n))) â‰¤ PoW t (Suc n)"
      using pow_ge_lgth[of nid t "Suc n"] by simp
    ultimately have "length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n))) < PoW t (Suc n)" by auto
    moreover from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n))) â‰¥ PoW t n"
      using pow_le_max by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  next
    assume asmp: "Â¬ (âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™)))"
    moreover from â€¹nidâˆˆactHn (t (Suc n))â€º have "honest nid" and "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™"
      using actHn_def by auto
    moreover from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))â€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
      using mine by simp
    hence "âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t (Suc n) n'" by auto
    ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™) @ [b])"
      using bhv_hn_in[of nid "Suc n"] by auto
    moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = Suc n" using nxtAct_active by simp
    moreover have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = n"
    proof (rule latestActEq)
      from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º show "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" by simp
      show "Â¬ (âˆƒn''>n. n'' < Suc n âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™)" by simp
      show "n < Suc n" by simp
    qed
    hence "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = n" using latestAct_def by simp
    ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n) âˆ¨
    mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n) @ [b])" by simp
    with â€¹mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (Suc n)))â€º have "âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n)) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n) @ [b]" by simp
    moreover from â€¹âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜Suc nâ‡™ = nâ€º
      have "Â¬ (âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) < length b)"
      using asmp by simp
    with â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n)) â‰¥ PoW t n"
      using pow_le_lgth[of nid t n] by simp
    moreover from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t (Suc n)â‡™â€º have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t (Suc n))) â‰¤ PoW t (Suc n)"
      using pow_ge_lgth[of nid t "Suc n"] by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

subsubsection "History"
text â€¹
  In the following we introduce an operator which extracts the development of a blockchain up to a time point @{term n}.
â€º

abbreviation "his_prop t n nid n' nid' x â‰¡
  (âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ§ âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âˆ§ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ§
  (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨
    (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))"

inductive_set 
his:: "trace â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid â‡’ (nat Ã— 'nid) set"
  for t::trace and n::nat and nid::'nid 
  where "âŸ¦âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™âŸ§ âŸ¹ (n,nid) âˆˆ his t n nid"
  | "âŸ¦(n',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid; âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' xâŸ§ âŸ¹ (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) âˆˆ his t n nid"

lemma his_act:
  assumes "(n',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"
  shows "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
  using assms
proof (rule his.cases)
  assume "(n', nid') = (n, nid)" and "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™"
  thus "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by simp
next
  fix n'' nid'' assume asmp: "(n', nid') = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)"
  and "(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"
  hence "his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)"
    using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"] by auto
  hence "âˆ¥snd (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)âˆ¥â‡˜t (fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x))â‡™"
    by blast
  moreover from asmp have "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x) = fst (n', nid')" by simp
  moreover from asmp have "snd (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x) = snd (n', nid')" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

text â€¹
  In addition we also introduce an operator to obtain the predecessor of a blockchains development.
â€º

definition "hisPred"
  where "hisPred t n nid n' â‰¡ (GREATEST n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < n')"

lemma hisPrev_prop:
  assumes "âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  shows "hisPred t n nid n' < n'" and "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
proof -
  from assms obtain n'' where "âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n''<n'" by auto
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n''<n'â€º
    have "âˆƒi'â‰¤n'. (âˆƒnid'. (i', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ i' < n') âˆ§ (âˆ€n'a. (âˆƒnid'. (n'a, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'a < n') âŸ¶ n'a â‰¤ i')"
    using boundedGreatest[of "Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < n'" n'' n'] by simp
  then obtain i' where "âˆ€n'a. (âˆƒnid'. (n'a, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'a < n') âŸ¶ n'a â‰¤ i'" by auto
  ultimately show "hisPred t n nid n' < n'" and "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
    using GreatestI_nat[of "Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < n'" n'' i'] hisPred_def by auto
qed

lemma hisPrev_nex_less:
  assumes "âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  shows "Â¬(âˆƒxâˆˆhis t n nid. fst x < n' âˆ§ fst x>hisPred t n nid n')"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "Â¬Â¬(âˆƒxâˆˆhis t n nid. fst x < n' âˆ§ fst x>hisPred t n nid n')"
  then obtain n'' nid'' where "(n'',nid'')âˆˆhis t n nid" and "n''< n'" and "n''>hisPred t n nid n'" by auto
  moreover have "n''â‰¤hisPred t n nid n'"
  proof -
    from â€¹(n'',nid'')âˆˆhis t n nidâ€º â€¹n''< n'â€º have "âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n''<n'" by auto
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n''<n'â€º have "âˆƒi'â‰¤n'. (âˆƒnid'. (i', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ i' < n') âˆ§ (âˆ€n'a. (âˆƒnid'. (n'a, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'a < n') âŸ¶ n'a â‰¤ i')"
      using boundedGreatest[of "Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < n'" n'' n'] by simp
    then obtain i' where "âˆ€n'a. (âˆƒnid'. (n'a, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'a < n') âŸ¶ n'a â‰¤ i'" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using Greatest_le_nat[of "Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < n'" n'' i'] hisPred_def by simp
  qed
  ultimately show False by simp
qed

lemma his_le:
  assumes "x âˆˆ his t n nid"
  shows "fst xâ‰¤n"
using assms
proof (induction rule: his.induct)
  case 1
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (2 n' nid')
  moreover have "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) â‰¤ n'"
  proof -
    from "2.hyps" have "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x" by simp
    hence "his_prop t n nid n' nid' (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)"
      using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x"] by auto
    hence "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™" by force
    moreover from â€¹his_prop t n nid n' nid' (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)â€º
    have "âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n" by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis using latestAct_prop(2)[of n' nid' t] by simp
  qed
  ultimately show ?case by simp
qed

lemma his_determ_base:
  shows "(n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âŸ¹ nid'=nid"
proof (rule his.cases)
  assume "(n, nid') = (n, nid)"
  thus ?thesis by simp
next
  fix n' nid'a
  assume "(n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "(n, nid') = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x)"
    and "(n', nid'a) âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x"
  hence "his_prop t n nid n' nid'a (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x)"
    using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x"] by auto
  hence "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x) = âŸ¨nid'a â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™" by force
  moreover from â€¹his_prop t n nid n' nid'a (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x)â€º
    have "âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid'a t n' n" by simp
  ultimately have "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x) < n'"
    using latestAct_prop(2)[of n' nid'a t] by simp
  with â€¹(n, nid') = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'a x)â€º have "fst (n, nid')<n'" by simp
  hence "n<n'" by simp
  moreover from â€¹(n', nid'a) âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n'â‰¤n" using his_le by auto
  ultimately show "nid' = nid" by simp
qed

lemma hisPrev_same:
  assumes "âˆƒn'<n''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  and "âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  and "(n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  and "(n'',nid'')âˆˆ his t n nid"
  and "hisPred t n nid n'=hisPred t n nid n''"
  shows "n'=n''"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "Â¬ n'=n''"
  hence "n'>n'' âˆ¨ n'<n''" by auto
  thus False
  proof
    assume "n'<n''"
    hence "fst (n',nid')<n''" by simp
    moreover from assms(2) have "hisPred t n nid n'<n'" using hisPrev_prop(1) by simp
    with assms have "hisPred t n nid n''<n'" by simp
    hence "hisPred t n nid n''<fst (n',nid')" by simp
    ultimately show False using hisPrev_nex_less[of n'' t n nid] assms by auto
  next (*Symmetric*)
    assume "n'>n''"
    hence "fst (n'',nid')<n'" by simp
    moreover from assms(1) have "hisPred t n nid n''<n''" using hisPrev_prop(1) by simp
    with assms have "hisPred t n nid n'<n''" by simp
    hence "hisPred t n nid n'<fst (n'',nid')" by simp
    ultimately show False using hisPrev_nex_less[of n' t n nid] assms by auto
  qed
qed

lemma his_determ_ext:
  shows "n'â‰¤n âŸ¹ (âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) âŸ¹ (âˆƒ!nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) âˆ§
    ((âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x) âˆ§
    (hisPred t n nid n', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x))"
proof (induction n' rule: my_induct)
  case base
  then obtain nid' where "(n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
  hence "âˆƒ!nid'. (n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"
  proof
    fix nid'' assume "(n, nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid"
    with his_determ_base have "nid''=nid" by simp
    moreover from â€¹(n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "nid'=nid" using his_determ_base by simp
    ultimately show "nid'' = nid'" by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(âˆƒn''<n. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n (THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n, (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n (THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)"
  proof
    assume "âˆƒn''<n. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
    hence "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" using hisPrev_prop(2) by simp
    hence "(hisPred t n nid n, (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) âˆˆ his t n nid"
      using someI_ex[of "Î»nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
    thus "(âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n (THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x) âˆ§
      (hisPred t n nid n, (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n (THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)"
    proof (rule his.cases)
      assume "(hisPred t n nid n, SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (n, nid)"
      hence "hisPred t n nid n=n" by simp
      with â€¹âˆƒn''<n. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show ?thesis using hisPrev_prop(1)[of n t n nid] by force
    next
      fix n'' nid'' assume asmp: "(hisPred t n nid n, SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)"
      and "(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"
      moreover have "n''=n"
      proof (rule antisym)
        show "n''â‰¥n"
        proof (rule ccontr)
          assume "(Â¬n''â‰¥n)"
          hence "n''<n" by simp
          moreover have "n''>hisPred t n nid n"
          proof -
            let ?x="Î»x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"
            from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' (SOME x. ?x x)"
              using someI_ex[of ?x] by auto
            hence "n''>fst (SOME x. ?x x)" using latestAct_prop(2)[of n'' nid'' t] by force
            moreover from asmp have "fst (hisPred t n nid n, SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = fst (SOME x. ?x x)" by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by simp
          qed
          moreover from â€¹âˆƒn''<n. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "Â¬(âˆƒxâˆˆhis t n nid. fst x < n âˆ§ fst x > hisPred t n nid n)"
            using hisPrev_nex_less by simp
          ultimately show False using â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º by auto
        qed
      next
        from â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show "n'' â‰¤ n" using his_le by auto
      qed
      ultimately have "(hisPred t n nid n, SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n nid'' x)" by simp
      moreover from â€¹n''=nâ€º â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "(n, nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid" by simp
      with â€¹âˆƒ!nid'. (n,nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "nid''=(THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
        using the1_equality[of "Î»nid'. (n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' xâ€º â€¹n''=nâ€º â€¹nid''=(THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)â€º
        have "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n (THE nid'. (n,nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?case by simp
next
  case (step n')
  then obtain nid' where "(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
  hence "âˆƒ!nid'. (n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"
  proof (rule his.cases)
    assume "(n', nid') = (n, nid)"
    hence "n'=n" by simp
    with step.hyps show ?thesis by simp
  next
    fix n'''' nid''''
    assume "(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nid"
      and n'nid': "(n', nid') = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' x)"
      and "(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' x"
    from â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show ?thesis
    proof
      fix nid'' assume "(n', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid"
      thus "nid'' = nid'"
      proof (rule his.cases)
        assume "(n', nid'') = (n, nid)"
        hence "n'=n" by simp
        with step.hyps show ?thesis by simp
      next
        fix n''' nid'''
        assume "(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nid"
          and n'nid'': "(n', nid'') = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x)"
          and "(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x"
        moreover have "n'''=n''''"
        proof -
          have "hisPred t n nid n''' = n'"
          proof -
            from n'nid'' â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' xâ€º
              have "his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' (n',nid'')"
              using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x"] by auto
            hence "n'''>n'" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
            moreover from â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n'''â‰¤ n" using his_le by auto
            moreover from â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
              have "âˆƒnid'. (n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
            ultimately have "(âˆƒn'<n'''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒ!nid'. (n''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n''' (THE nid'. (n''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" using step.IH by auto
            with â€¹n'''>n'â€º â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "âˆƒ!nid'. (n''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "(hisPred t n nid n''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n''' (THE nid'. (n''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" by auto
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒ!nid'. (n''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "nid'''=(THE nid'. (n''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)" using the1_equality[of "Î»nid'. (n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
            ultimately have "(hisPred t n nid n''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x)" by simp
            with n'nid'' have "(n', nid'') = (hisPred t n nid n''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid))" by simp
            thus ?thesis by simp
          qed
          moreover have "hisPred t n nid n'''' = n'" (*Symmetric*)
          proof -
            from n'nid' â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' (n',nid')"
              using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' x"] by auto
            hence "n''''>n'" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
            moreover from â€¹(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n''''â‰¤ n" using his_le by auto
            moreover from â€¹(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
              have "âˆƒnid'. (n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
            ultimately have "(âˆƒn'<n''''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒ!nid'. (n'''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n'''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'''' (THE nid'. (n'''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" using step.IH by auto
            with â€¹n''''>n'â€º â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "âˆƒ!nid'. (n'''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "(hisPred t n nid n'''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'''' (THE nid'. (n'''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" by auto
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒ!nid'. (n'''',nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "nid''''=(THE nid'. (n'''',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)" using the1_equality[of "Î»nid'. (n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
            ultimately have "(hisPred t n nid n'''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' x)" by simp
            with n'nid' have "(n', nid') = (hisPred t n nid n'''', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid))" by simp
            thus ?thesis by simp
          qed
          ultimately have "hisPred t n nid n'''=hisPred t n nid n''''" ..
          moreover have "âˆƒn'<n'''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
          proof -
            from n'nid'' â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' (n',nid'')"
              using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x"] by auto
            hence "n'''>n'" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
            with â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show ?thesis by auto
          qed
          moreover have "âˆƒn'<n''''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
          proof -
            from n'nid' â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' (n',nid')"
              using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n'''' nid'''' x"] by auto
            hence "n''''>n'" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
            with â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show ?thesis by auto
          qed
          ultimately show ?thesis
            using hisPrev_same â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            by blast
        qed
        moreover have "nid'''=nid''''"
        proof -
          from n'nid'' â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' xâ€º
            have "his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' (n',nid'')"
            using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n''' nid''' x"] by auto
          hence "n'''>n'" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
          moreover from â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n'''â‰¤ n" using his_le by auto
          moreover from â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "âˆƒnid'. (n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
          ultimately have "âˆƒ!nid'. (n''', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" using step.IH by auto
          with â€¹(n''', nid''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n'''', nid'''') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹n'''=n''''â€º
            show ?thesis by auto
        qed
        ultimately have "(n', nid') = (n', nid'')" using n'nid' by simp
        thus "nid'' = nid'" by simp
      qed
    qed
  qed
  moreover have "(âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)"
  proof
    assume "âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
    hence "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" using hisPrev_prop(2) by simp
    hence "(hisPred t n nid n', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) âˆˆ his t n nid"
      using someI_ex[of "Î»nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
    thus "(âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)"
    proof (rule his.cases)
      assume "(hisPred t n nid n', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (n, nid)"
      hence "hisPred t n nid n'=n" by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "hisPred t n nid n'<n'"
        using hisPrev_prop(1)[of n'] by force
      ultimately show ?thesis using step.hyps by simp
    next
      fix n'' nid'' assume asmp: "(hisPred t n nid n', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)"
      and "(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"
      moreover have "n''=n'"
      proof (rule antisym)
        show "n''â‰¥n'"
        proof (rule ccontr)
          assume "(Â¬n''â‰¥n')"
          hence "n''<n'" by simp
          moreover have "n''>hisPred t n nid n'"
          proof -
            let ?x="Î»x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x"
            from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' (SOME x. ?x x)"
              using someI_ex[of ?x] by auto
            hence "n''>fst (SOME x. ?x x)" using latestAct_prop(2)[of n'' nid'' t] by force
            moreover from asmp have "fst (hisPred t n nid n', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = fst (SOME x. ?x x)" by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by simp
          qed
          moreover from â€¹âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "Â¬(âˆƒxâˆˆhis t n nid. fst x < n' âˆ§ fst x > hisPred t n nid n')"
            using hisPrev_nex_less by simp
          ultimately show False using â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º by auto
        qed
      next
        show "n'â‰¥n''"
        proof (rule ccontr)
          assume "(Â¬n'â‰¥n'')"
          hence "n'<n''" by simp
          moreover from â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n''â‰¤ n" using his_le by auto
          moreover from â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
          ultimately have "(âˆƒn'<n''. âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) âŸ¶ (âˆƒ!nid'. (n'',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) âˆ§ (hisPred t n nid n'', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' (THE nid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" using step.IH by auto
          with â€¹n'<n''â€º â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "âˆƒ!nid'. (n'',nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "(hisPred t n nid n'', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' (THE nid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x)" by auto
          moreover from â€¹âˆƒ!nid'. (n'',nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "nid'' = (THE nid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
            using the1_equality[of "Î»nid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
          ultimately have "(hisPred t n nid n'', (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' x)" by simp
          with asmp have "(hisPred t n nid n', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)=(hisPred t n nid n'', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)" by simp
          hence "hisPred t n nid n' = hisPred t n nid n''" by simp
          with â€¹âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹n'<n''â€º â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹(n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "n'=n''" using hisPrev_same by blast
          with â€¹n'<n''â€º show False by simp
        qed
      qed
      ultimately have "(hisPred t n nid n', SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) = (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid'' x)" by simp
      moreover from â€¹(n'', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º â€¹n''=n'â€º have "(n', nid'') âˆˆ his t n nid" by simp
      with â€¹âˆƒ!nid'. (n',nid') âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "nid''=(THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
        using the1_equality[of "Î»nid'. (n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"] by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n'' nid'' xâ€º â€¹n''=n'â€º â€¹nid''=(THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)â€º
        have "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' (THE nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?case by simp
qed

corollary his_determ_ex:
  assumes "(n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"
  shows "âˆƒ!nid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"
  using assms his_le his_determ_ext[of n' n t nid] by force

corollary his_determ:
  assumes "(n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"
    and "(n',nid'')âˆˆhis t n nid"
  shows "nid'=nid''" using assms his_le his_determ_ext[of n' n t nid] by force

corollary his_determ_the:
  assumes "(n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"
  shows "(THE nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) = nid'"
  using assms his_determ theI'[of "Î»nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"] his_determ_ex by simp

subsubsection "Blockchain Development"

definition devBC::"trace â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid option"
  where "devBC t n nid n' â‰¡
    (if (âˆƒnid'. (n', nid')âˆˆ his t n nid) then (Some (THE nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid))
    else Option.None)"

lemma devBC_some[simp]: assumes "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" shows "devBC t n nid n = Some nid"
proof -
  from assms have "(n, nid)âˆˆ his t n nid" using his.intros(1) by simp
  hence "devBC t n nid n = (Some (THE nid'. (n, nid')âˆˆhis t n nid))" using devBC_def by auto
  moreover have "(THE nid'. (n, nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) = nid"
  proof
    from â€¹(n, nid)âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show "(n, nid)âˆˆ his t n nid" .
  next
    fix nid' assume "(n, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid"
    thus "nid' = nid" using his_determ_base by simp
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma devBC_act: assumes "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" shows "âˆ¥the (devBC t n nid n')âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"
proof -
  from assms have "Â¬ devBC t n nid n'=Option.None" by (metis is_none_simps(1))
  then obtain nid' where "(n', nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" and "devBC t n nid n' = (Some (THE nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid))"
    using devBC_def[of t n nid] by metis
  hence "nid'= (THE nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)" using his_determ_the by simp
  with â€¹devBC t n nid n' = (Some (THE nid'. (n', nid')âˆˆhis t n nid))â€º have "the (devBC t n nid n') = nid'" by simp
  with â€¹(n', nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º show ?thesis using his_act by simp
qed

lemma his_ex:
  assumes "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')"
  shows "âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "Â¬(âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
  with devBC_def have "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" by simp
  with assms show False by simp
qed

lemma devExt_nopt_leq:
  assumes "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')"
  shows "n'â‰¤n"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒnid'. (n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" using his_ex by simp
  then obtain nid' where "(n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" by auto
  with his_le[of "(n',nid')"] show ?thesis by simp
qed

text â€¹
  An extended version of the development in which deactivations are filled with the last value.
â€º

function devExt::"trace â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ 'nid BC"
  where "âŸ¦âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'); Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)âŸ§ âŸ¹ devExt t n nid nâ‡©s 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'. n'<nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n'. n'<nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'))))"
  | "âŸ¦Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')); Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)âŸ§ âŸ¹ devExt t n nid nâ‡©s 0 = []"
  | "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ devExt t n nid nâ‡©s 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â‡™(t nâ‡©s))"
  | "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))"
  | "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'"
proof -
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid nâ‡©s' ta na nida.
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')))â‡™t (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'))) =
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida
                    (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida n')))â‡™ta (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida n')))" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid nâ‡©s' ta na nida.
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹

  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s'.
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')))â‡™t (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'))) =
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s')â‡™ta nâ‡©s')" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')))â‡™t (GREATEST n'. n' < nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'))) =
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))â‡™ta (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
       âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹
