       devExt_sumC (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', n')" by auto
  show"â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid nâ‡©s' ta na nida.
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹ (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹ [] = []" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s'.
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹ (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹ [] = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s')â‡™ta nâ‡©s')" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹ [] = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))â‡™ta (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))" by auto
  show "â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
       Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹ (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹ [] = devExt_sumC (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', n')" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s ta na nida nâ‡©s'.
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s') âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', 0) âŸ¹ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â‡™t nâ‡©s) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida nâ‡©s')â‡™ta nâ‡©s')" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
        Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
        Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹
        (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â‡™t nâ‡©s) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))â‡™ta (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'))" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'.
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n') âŸ¹ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â‡™t nâ‡©s) = devExt_sumC (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', n')" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n' ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'a.
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'a)) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n'a) âŸ¹
       bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'a))â‡™ta (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'a))" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n' ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'a.
       Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'a)) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n'a) âŸ¹ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = devExt_sumC (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', n'a)" by auto
  show "â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n' ta na nida nâ‡©s' n'a.
       Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹
       Option.is_none (devBC ta na nida (nâ‡©s' + Suc n'a)) âŸ¹
       (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') = (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', Suc n'a) âŸ¹ devExt_sumC (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, n') = devExt_sumC (ta, na, nida, nâ‡©s', n'a)" by auto
  show "â‹€P x. (â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid. âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P) âŸ¹
           (â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid. Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P) âŸ¹
           (â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P) âŸ¹
           (â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') âŸ¹ P) âŸ¹
           (â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n'. Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') âŸ¹ P) âŸ¹ P"
  proof -
    fix P::bool and x::"trace Ã—natÃ—'nidÃ—natÃ—nat"
    assume a1:"(â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid. âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n') âŸ¹ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P)" and
           a2:"(â‹€nâ‡©s t n nid. Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')) âŸ¹ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P)" and
           a3:"(â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, 0) âŸ¹ P)" and
           a4:"(â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') âŸ¹ P)" and
           a5:"(â‹€t n nid nâ‡©s n'. Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âŸ¹ x = (t, n, nid, nâ‡©s, Suc n') âŸ¹ P)"
    show P
    proof (cases x)
      case (fields t n nid nâ‡©s n')
      then show ?thesis
      proof (cases n')
        case 0
        then show ?thesis
        proof cases
          assume "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)"
          thus ?thesis
          proof cases
            assume "âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')"
            with â€¹x = (t, n , nid, nâ‡©s, n')â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â€º â€¹n'=0â€º show ?thesis using a1 by simp
          next
            assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'))"
            with â€¹x = (t, n , nid, nâ‡©s, n')â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)â€º â€¹n'=0â€º show ?thesis using a2 by simp
          qed
        next
          assume "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid nâ‡©s)"
          with â€¹x = (t, n , nid, nâ‡©s, n')â€º â€¹n'=0â€º show ?thesis using a3 by simp
        qed
      next
        case (Suc n'')
        then show ?thesis
        proof cases
          assume "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))"
          with â€¹x = (t, n , nid, nâ‡©s, n')â€º â€¹n'=Suc n''â€º show ?thesis using a5[of t n nid nâ‡©s n''] by simp
        next
          assume "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))"
          with â€¹x = (t, n , nid, nâ‡©s, n')â€º â€¹n'=Suc n''â€º show ?thesis using a4[of t n nid nâ‡©s n''] by simp
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed
qed
termination by lexicographic_order

lemma devExt_same:
  assumes "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')"
    and "n'â‰¥nâ‡©s"
    and "n'''â‰¤n''"
  shows "n'''â‰¥n'âŸ¹devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n'''-nâ‡©s) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n'-nâ‡©s)"
proof (induction n''' rule: dec_induct)
  case base
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (step n'''')
  hence "Suc n''''>n'" by simp
  moreover from step.hyps assms(3) have "Suc n''''â‰¤n''" by simp
  ultimately have "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (Suc n''''))" using assms(1) by simp
  moreover from assms(2) step.hyps have "n''''â‰¥nâ‡©s" by simp
  hence "Suc n'''' = nâ‡©s + Suc (n''''-nâ‡©s)" by simp
  ultimately have "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc (n''''-nâ‡©s)))" by metis
  hence "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc (n''''-nâ‡©s)) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n''''-nâ‡©s)" by simp
  moreover from â€¹n''''â‰¥nâ‡©sâ€º have "Suc (n''''-nâ‡©s) = Suc n''''-nâ‡©s" by simp
  ultimately have "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n''''-nâ‡©s) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n''''-nâ‡©s)" by simp
  with step.IH show ?case by simp
qed

lemma devExt_bc[simp]:
  assumes "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))"
  shows "devExt t n nid n' n'' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â‡™(t (n'+n'')))"
proof (cases n'')
  case 0
  with assms show ?thesis by simp
next
  case (Suc nat)
  with assms show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma devExt_greatest:
  assumes "âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')"
    and "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))" and "Â¬ n''=0"
  shows "devExt t n nid n' n'' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))))"
proof -
  let ?P="Î»n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')"
  let ?G="GREATEST n'''. ?P n'''"
  have "âˆ€n'''>n'+n''. Â¬ ?P n'''" by simp
  with â€¹âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')â€º have "âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')" using boundedGreatest[of ?P] by blast
  hence "?P ?G" using GreatestI_ex_nat[of ?P] by auto
  hence "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)" by simp
  show ?thesis
  proof cases
    assume "?G>n'"
    hence "?G-n'+n' = ?G" by simp
    with â€¹Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)â€º have "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (?G-n'+n'))" by simp
    moreover from â€¹?G>n'â€º have "?G-n'â‰ 0" by auto
    hence "âˆƒnat. Suc nat = ?G - n'" by presburger
    then obtain nat where "Suc nat = ?G-n'" by auto
    ultimately have "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+Suc nat))" by simp
    hence "devExt t n nid n' (Suc nat) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (n' + Suc nat))â‡™t (n' + Suc nat))" by simp
    with â€¹Suc nat = ?G - n'â€º have "devExt t n nid n' (?G - n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (?G-n'+n'))â‡™(t (?G-n'+n')))" by simp
    with â€¹?G-n'+n' = ?Gâ€º have "devExt t n nid n' (?G - n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid ?G)â‡™(t ?G))" by simp
    moreover have "devExt t n nid n' (n' + n'' - n') = devExt t n nid n' (?G - n')"
    proof -
      from â€¹âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')â€º have "âˆ€n'''. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?G"
        using Greatest_le_nat[of ?P] by blast
      hence "âˆ€n'''>?G. n'''<n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
      with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º
        have "âˆ€n'''>?G. n'''â‰¤n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
      moreover from â€¹?P ?Gâ€º have "?Gâ‰¤n'+n''" by simp
      moreover from â€¹?G>n'â€º have "?Gâ‰¥n'" by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹?G>n'â€º devExt_same[of ?G "n'+n''" t n nid n' "n'+n''"] by blast
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  next
    assume "Â¬?G>n'"
    thus ?thesis
    proof cases
      assume "?G=n'"
      with â€¹Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)â€º have "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" by simp
      with â€¹Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)â€º have "devExt t n nid n' 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid n')â‡™(t n'))" by simp
      moreover have "devExt t n nid n' n'' = devExt t n nid n' 0"
      proof -
        from â€¹âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')â€º have "âˆ€n'''>?G. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?G"
          using Greatest_le_nat[of ?P] by blast
        with â€¹?G=n'â€º have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n''' < n' + n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by simp
        with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º
          have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
        moreover from â€¹Â¬ n''=0â€º have "n'<n'+n''" by simp
        ultimately show ?thesis using devExt_same[of n' "n'+n''" t n nid n' "n'+n''"] by simp
      qed
      ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹?G=n'â€º by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬?G=n'"
      with â€¹Â¬?G>n'â€º have "?G<n'" by simp
      hence "devExt t n nid n' n'' = devExt t n nid n' 0"
      proof -
        from â€¹âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')â€º have "âˆ€n'''>?G. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?G"
          using Greatest_le_nat[of ?P] by blast
        with â€¹Â¬?G>n'â€º have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''<n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
        with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º
          have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
        moreover from â€¹?P ?Gâ€º have "?G<n'+n''" by simp
        moreover from â€¹Â¬ n''=0â€º have "n'<n'+n''" by simp
        ultimately show ?thesis using devExt_same[of n' "n'+n''" t n nid n' "n'+n''"] by simp
      qed
      moreover have "devExt t n nid n' 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'''. n'''<n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n'''. n'''<n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))))"
      proof -
        from â€¹Â¬ n''=0â€º have "n'<n'+n''" by simp
        moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')â€º have "âˆ€n'''>?G. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?G" using Greatest_le_nat[of ?P] by blast
        ultimately have "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" using â€¹?G<n'â€º by simp
        moreover from â€¹âˆ€n'''>?G. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?Gâ€º â€¹?G<n'â€º â€¹n'<n'+n''â€º have "âˆ€n'''â‰¥n'. n'''<n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
        have "âˆƒn'''<n'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')"
        proof -
          from â€¹âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')â€º obtain n'''
            where "n'''<n'+n''" and "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
          moreover have "n'''<n'"
          proof (rule ccontr)
            assume "Â¬n'''<n'"
            hence "n'''â‰¥n'" by simp
            with â€¹âˆ€n'''â‰¥n'. n'''<n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')â€º â€¹n'''<n'+n''â€º
              â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')â€º show False by simp
          qed
          ultimately show ?thesis by auto
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis by simp
      qed
      moreover have "(GREATEST n'''. n'''<n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')) = ?G"
      proof(rule Greatest_equality)
        from â€¹?P ?Gâ€º have "?G < n'+n''" and "Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)" by auto
        with â€¹?G<n'â€º show "?G < n' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid ?G)" by simp
      next
        fix y assume "y < n' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid y)"
        moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'''. ?P n''' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''''. ?P n'''' âŸ¶ n''''â‰¤n''')â€º
          have "âˆ€n'''. ?P n''' âŸ¶ n'''â‰¤?G" using Greatest_le_nat[of ?P] by blast
        ultimately show "y â‰¤ ?G" by simp
      qed
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma devExt_shift: "devExt t n nid (n'+n'') 0 = devExt t n nid n' n''"
proof (cases)
  assume "n''=0"
  thus ?thesis by simp
next
  assume "Â¬ (n''=0)"
  thus ?thesis
  proof (cases)
    assume "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))"
    thus ?thesis
    proof cases
      assume "âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')"
      with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º have "devExt t n nid (n'+n'') 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))))" by simp
      moreover from â€¹Â¬ (n''=0)â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º â€¹âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')â€º have "devExt t n nid n' n'' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n'''. n'''<(n'+n'') âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))))" using devExt_greatest by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))"
      with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º have "devExt t n nid (n'+n'') 0=[]" by simp
      moreover have "devExt t n nid n' n''=[]"
      proof -
        from â€¹Â¬ (âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))â€º â€¹n''â‰ 0â€º
          have "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" by simp
        moreover from â€¹Â¬ (âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))â€º
          have "Â¬ (âˆƒn'''<n'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))" by simp
        ultimately have "devExt t n nid n' 0=[]" by simp
        moreover have "devExt t n nid n' n''=devExt t n nid n' 0"
        proof -
          from â€¹Â¬ (âˆƒn'''<n'+n''. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'''))â€º
            have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n''' < n' + n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by simp
          with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º 
            have "âˆ€n'''>n'. n'''â‰¤n'+n'' âŸ¶ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''')" by auto
          moreover from â€¹Â¬ n''=0â€º have "n'<n'+n''" by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis using devExt_same[of n' "n'+n''" t n nid n' "n'+n''"] by simp
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis by simp
      qed
      ultimately show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  next
    assume "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))"
    hence "devExt t n nid (n'+n'') 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â‡™(t (n'+n'')))" by simp
    moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â€º
      have "devExt t n nid n' n'' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (n'+n''))â‡™(t (n'+n'')))" by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
qed

lemma devExt_bc_geq:
  assumes "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n')" and "n'â‰¥nâ‡©s"
  shows "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n'-nâ‡©s) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid n')â‡™(t n'))" (is "?LHS = ?RHS")
proof -
  have "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n'-nâ‡©s) = devExt t n nid (nâ‡©s+(n'-nâ‡©s)) 0" using devExt_shift by auto
  moreover from assms(2) have "nâ‡©s+(n'-nâ‡©s) = n'" by simp
  ultimately have "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (n'-nâ‡©s) = devExt t n nid n' 0" by simp
  with assms(1) show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma his_bc_empty:
  assumes "(n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" and "Â¬(âˆƒn''<n'. âˆƒnid''. (n'',nid'')âˆˆ his t n nid)"
  shows "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = []"
proof -
  have "Â¬ (âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)"
  proof (rule ccontr)
    assume "Â¬ Â¬ (âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)"
    hence "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x" by simp
    with â€¹(n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º have "(SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) âˆˆ his t n nid"
      using his.intros by simp
    moreover from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid n' nid' xâ€º have "his_prop t n nid n' nid' (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)"
      using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x"] by auto
    hence "(âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ§ fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™"
      by force
    hence "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x) < n'" using latestAct_prop(2)[of n' nid' t] by force
    ultimately have "fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x)<n' âˆ§
      (fst (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x),snd (SOME x. his_prop t n nid n' nid' x))âˆˆ his t n nid" by simp
    thus False using assms(2) by blast
  qed
  hence "âˆ€x. Â¬ (âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ¨ Â¬ âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))" by auto
  hence "Â¬ (âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ¨ (âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ§ (âˆ€x. Â¬ âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')))))" by auto
  thus ?thesis
  proof
    assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n)"
    moreover from assms(1) have "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" using his_act by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis using init_model by simp
  next
    assume "(âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n) âˆ§ (âˆ€x. Â¬ âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')))))"
    hence "âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' n" and "âˆ€x. Â¬ âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âˆ¨ Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))" by auto
    hence asmp: "âˆ€x. âˆ¥snd xâˆ¥â‡˜t (fst x)â‡™ âŸ¶ fst x = âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™ âŸ¶ Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd xâ‡™(t (fst x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))" by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof cases
      assume "honest nid'"
      moreover from assms(1) have "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" using his_act by simp
      ultimately obtain nid'' where "âˆ¥nid''âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â‡™" and "mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™) @ [b]) âˆ¨ Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)" using â€¹âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' nâ€º bhv_hn_context[of nid' t n'] by auto
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nid''âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â‡™â€º have "Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™(t (âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™(t (âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))" using asmp by auto
      ultimately have False by auto
      thus ?thesis ..
    next
      assume "Â¬ honest nid'"
      moreover from assms(1) have "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" using his_act by simp
      ultimately obtain nid'' where "âˆ¥nid''âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â‡™" and "(mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') âˆ§ (âˆƒb. prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n')) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™) @ [b])) âˆ¨ Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n') âˆ§ prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t n')) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)))" using â€¹âˆƒn. latestAct_cond nid' t n' nâ€º bhv_dn_context[of nid' t n'] by auto
      moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nid''âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™â‡™â€º have "Â¬ (prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™(t (âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n')) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid''â‡™(t (âŸ¨nid' â† tâŸ©â‡˜n'â‡™)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t n'))))" using asmp by auto
      ultimately have False by auto
      thus ?thesis ..
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma devExt_devop:
  "prefix (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n')) (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')â‡™ âˆ§ nâ‡©s + Suc n' â‰¤ n âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))"
proof cases
  assume "nâ‡©s + Suc n' > n"
  hence "Â¬(âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)" using his_le by fastforce
  hence "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))" using devBC_def by simp
  hence "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'" by simp
  thus ?thesis by simp
next
  assume "Â¬nâ‡©s + Suc n' > n"
  hence "nâ‡©s + Suc n' â‰¤ n" by simp
  show ?thesis
  proof cases
    assume "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))"
    hence "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'" by simp
    thus ?thesis by simp
  next
    assume "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))"
    hence "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc n') = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))" by simp
    moreover have "prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))) (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n' @ [b] âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')â‡™ âˆ§ nâ‡©s + Suc n' â‰¤ n âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))))"
    proof cases
      assume "âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
      let ?nid="(THE nid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
      let ?x="SOME x. his_prop t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') ?nid x"
      from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â€º
        have "nâ‡©s + Suc n'â‰¤n" using devExt_nopt_leq by simp
      moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â€º
        have "âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" using his_ex by simp
      ultimately have "âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') (THE nid'. ((nâ‡©s + Suc n'),nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) x"
        and "(hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)) = ?x"
        using â€¹âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
        his_determ_ext[of "nâ‡©s + Suc n'" n t nid] by auto
      moreover have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜(SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)â‡™(t (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'"
      proof cases
        assume "Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))"
        have "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (GREATEST n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')))â‡™(t (GREATEST n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''))))"
        proof cases
          assume "n'=0"
          moreover have "âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s+n'. Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')"
          proof -
            from â€¹âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º obtain n''
              where "n''<Suc nâ‡©s + n'" and "âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
            hence "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')" using devBC_def by simp
            moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')â€º
              â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º have "Â¬ n''=nâ‡©s+n'" by auto
            with â€¹n''<Suc nâ‡©s+n'â€º have "n''<nâ‡©s+n'" by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by auto
          qed
          ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º by simp
        next
          assume "Â¬ n'=0"
          moreover have "âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + n'. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')"
          proof -
            from â€¹âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º obtain n''
              where "n''<Suc nâ‡©s + n'" and "âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid" by auto
            hence "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')" using devBC_def by simp
            moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º
              have "Â¬ n''=nâ‡©s+n'" by auto
            with â€¹n''<Suc nâ‡©s+n'â€º have "n''<nâ‡©s+n'" by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by auto
          qed
          with â€¹Â¬ (n'=0)â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º show ?thesis
            using devExt_greatest[of nâ‡©s n' t n nid] by simp
        qed
        moreover have "(GREATEST n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''))=hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
        proof -
          have "(Î»n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')) = (Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
          proof
            fix n''
            show "(n'' < nâ‡©s + n' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')) = (âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
            proof
              assume "n'' < nâ‡©s + n' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')"
              thus "(âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')" using his_ex by simp
            next
              assume "(âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
              hence "âˆƒnid'. (n'', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" and "n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n'" by auto
              hence "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')" using devBC_def by simp
              moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')â€º â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º
              have "n''â‰ nâ‡©s+n'" by auto
              with â€¹n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n'â€º have "n'' < nâ‡©s + n'" by simp
              ultimately show "n'' < nâ‡©s + n' âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')" by simp
            qed
          qed
          hence "(GREATEST n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n''))= (GREATEST n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')" using arg_cong[of "Î»n''. n''<nâ‡©s+n' âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t n nid n'')" "(Î»n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < nâ‡©s + Suc n')"] by simp
          with hisPred_def show ?thesis by simp
        qed
        moreover have "the (devBC t n nid (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))=(SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"
        proof -
          from â€¹âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
            using hisPrev_prop(2) by simp
          hence "the (devBC t n nid (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = (THE nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
            using devBC_def by simp
          moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "(hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) âˆˆ his t n nid"
            using someI_ex[of "Î»nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"] by simp
          hence "(THE nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) = (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"
            using his_determ_the by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis by simp
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis by simp
      next
        assume "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))"
        hence "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n' = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s+n')))"
        proof cases
          assume "n'=0"
          with â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º show ?thesis by simp
        next
          assume "Â¬ n'=0"
          hence "âˆƒnat. n' = Suc nat" by presburger
          then obtain nat where "n' = Suc nat" by auto
          with â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º have "devExt t n nid nâ‡©s (Suc nat) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc nat))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc nat)))" by simp
          with â€¹n' = Suc natâ€º  show ?thesis by simp
        qed
        moreover have "hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') = nâ‡©s+n'"
        proof -
          have "(GREATEST n''. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ n'' < (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = nâ‡©s+n'"
          proof (rule Greatest_equality)
            from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+n'))â€º have "âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid" using his_ex by simp
            thus "âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ nâ‡©s + n' < nâ‡©s + Suc n'" by simp
          next
            fix y assume "âˆƒnid'. (y, nid') âˆˆ his t n nid âˆ§ y < nâ‡©s + Suc n'"
            thus "y â‰¤ nâ‡©s + n'" by simp
          qed
          thus ?thesis using hisPred_def by simp
        qed
        moreover have "the (devBC t n nid (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))=(SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"
        proof -
          from â€¹âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆ his t n nid"
            using hisPrev_prop(2) by simp
          hence "the (devBC t n nid (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = (THE nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid)"
            using devBC_def by simp
          moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
            have "(hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid) âˆˆ his t n nid"
            using someI_ex[of "Î»nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid"] by simp
          hence "(THE nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid')âˆˆhis t n nid) = (SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"
            using his_determ_the by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis by simp
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis by simp
      qed
      ultimately have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd ?xâ‡™(t (fst ?x))) = devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'"
        using fst_conv[of "hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
        "(SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"]
        snd_conv[of "hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')"
        "(SOME nid'. (hisPred t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'), nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"] by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒx. his_prop t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') ?nid xâ€º
        have "his_prop t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') ?nid ?x"
        using someI_ex[of "Î»x. his_prop t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n') ?nid x"] by blast
      hence "prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))) (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd ?xâ‡™(t (fst ?x)))) âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜snd ?xâ‡™(t (fst ?x)))) @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))))" by blast
      ultimately have "prefix (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')))) (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n') @ [b] âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜?nidâ‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))))" by simp
      moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆ his t n nidâ€º
        have "?nid=the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))" using devBC_def by simp
      moreover have "âˆ¥the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n')â‡™"
      proof -
        from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nidâ€º obtain nid'
          where "(nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" by auto
        with his_determ_the have "nid' = (THE nid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)" by simp
        with â€¹?nid=the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â€º
          have "the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = nid'" by simp
        with â€¹(nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nidâ€º show ?thesis using his_act by simp
      qed
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s+Suc n'))â€º â€¹nâ‡©s + Suc n' â‰¤ nâ€º by simp
    next
      assume "Â¬ (âˆƒn''<nâ‡©s + Suc n'. âˆƒnid'. (n'',nid')âˆˆ his t n nid)"
      moreover have "(nâ‡©s + Suc n', the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) âˆˆ his t n nid"
      proof -
        from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â€º
          have "âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" using his_ex by simp
        hence "the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = (THE nid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)"
          using devBC_def by simp
        moreover from â€¹âˆƒnid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nidâ€º obtain nid'
          where "(nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nid" by auto
        with his_determ_the have "nid' = (THE nid'. (nâ‡©s + Suc n', nid') âˆˆ his t n nid)" by simp
        ultimately have "the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n')) = nid'" by simp
        with â€¹(nâ‡©s + Suc n',nid')âˆˆhis t n nidâ€º show ?thesis by simp
      qed
      ultimately have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t n nid (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))â‡™(t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'))) = []"
        using his_bc_empty by simp
      thus ?thesis by simp
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
qed

abbreviation devLgthBC where "devLgthBC t n nid nâ‡©s â‰¡ (Î»n'. length (devExt t n nid nâ‡©s n'))"

theorem blockchain_save:
  fixes t::"natâ‡’cnf" and nâ‡©s and sbc and n
  assumes "âˆ€nid. honest nid âŸ¶ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t (âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™))))"
    and "âˆ€nidâˆˆactDn (t nâ‡©s). length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t nâ‡©s))) < length sbc"
    and "PoW t nâ‡©sâ‰¥length sbc + cb"
    and "âˆ€n'<nâ‡©s. âˆ€nid. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™ âŸ¶ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n')) < length sbc âˆ¨ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n')))"
    and "nâ‰¥nâ‡©s"
  shows "âˆ€nid âˆˆ actHn (t n). prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)))"
proof (cases)
  assume "sbc=[]"
  thus ?thesis by simp
next
  assume "Â¬ sbc=[]"
  have "nâ‰¥nâ‡©s âŸ¹ âˆ€nid âˆˆ actHn (t n). prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™(t n)))"
  proof (induction n rule: ge_induct)
    case (step n)
    show ?case
    proof
      fix nid assume "nid âˆˆ actHn (t n)"
      hence "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™" and "honest nid" using actHn_def by auto
      show "prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t n))"
      proof cases
        assume lAct: "âˆƒn' < n. n' â‰¥ nâ‡©s âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™"    
        show ?thesis
        proof cases
          assume "âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
          moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
          moreover from lAct have "âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'" by auto
          ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆ¨
            mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) @ [b])"
            using â€¹honest nidâ€º bhv_hn_ex[of nid n t] by simp
          moreover have "prefix sbc (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
          proof -
            from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'â€º have "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
              using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
            hence "pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) â‰  {}" and "finite (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
              using nempty_input[of nid t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] finite_input[of nid t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] â€¹honest nidâ€º by auto
            hence "MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) âˆˆ pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)" using max_prop(1) by auto
            with â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º obtain nid' where "âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
              and "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
              using closed[where b="MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"] by blast
            moreover have "prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
            proof cases
              assume "honest nid'"
              with â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º have "nid' âˆˆ actHn (t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)"
                using actHn_def by simp
              moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'â€º have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ < n"
                using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
              moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¥ nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
              ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º step.IH by simp
            next
              assume "Â¬ honest nid'"
              show ?thesis
              proof (rule ccontr)
                assume "Â¬ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
                moreover have "âˆƒn'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s âˆ§ length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' 0) < length sbc âˆ§ (âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'')))"
                proof cases
                  assume "âˆƒn'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆ§ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))"
                  hence "âˆƒn'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆ§ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')) âˆ§ (âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'')))"
                  proof -
                    let ?P="Î»n'. n'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ n'â‰¥nâ‡©s  âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆ§ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))"
                    from â€¹âˆƒn'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s  âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆ§ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))â€º have "âˆƒn'. ?P n'" by simp
                    moreover have "âˆ€n'>âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. Â¬ ?P n'" by simp
                    ultimately obtain n' where "?P n'" and "âˆ€n''. ?P n'' âŸ¶ n''â‰¤n'" using boundedGreatest[of ?P _ "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"] by auto
                    hence "âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by auto
                    thus ?thesis using â€¹?P n'â€º by auto
                  qed
                  then obtain n' where "n'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" and "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')"
                    and "n'â‰¥nâ‡©s" and "honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))"
                    and "âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by auto
                  hence "n'â‰¥nâ‡©s" and dishonest: "âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by auto
                  moreover have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™<n" using â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'â€º latestAct_prop(2) by blast
                  with â€¹n'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º have "n'<n" by simp
                  moreover from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')â€º
                    have "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')âˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" using devBC_act by simp
                  with â€¹honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))â€º
                    have "the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆˆactHn (t n')" using actHn_def by simp
                  ultimately have "prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')â‡™t n'))"
                    using step.IH by simp
  
                  interpret ut: dishonest "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'" "Î»n. dmining t (n' + n)"
                  proof
                    fix n''
                    from devExt_devop[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' n'] have "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â‡™t (n' + Suc n''))" .
                    thus "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ dmining t (n' + Suc n'')"
                    proof
                      assume "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'')"
                      thus ?thesis by simp
                    next
                      assume "(âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â‡™t (n' + Suc n''))"
                      hence "âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]" and "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))" and "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™" and "n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" and "mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â‡™t (n' + Suc n''))" by auto
                      moreover from â€¹n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â€º have "Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')))" using dishonest by simp
                      with â€¹âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™â€º have "the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆˆactDn (t (n' + Suc n''))" using actDn_def by simp
                      ultimately show ?thesis using dmining_def by auto
                    qed
                  qed
                  from â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')â€º have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')â‡™t n') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' 0"
                    using devExt_bc_geq[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' n'] by simp
                  moreover from â€¹n'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n')"
                    using devExt_bc_geq by simp
                  with â€¹Â¬ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))â€º have "Â¬ prefix sbc (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n'))" by simp
                  ultimately have "âˆƒn'''. n''' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n' âˆ§ length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n''') < length sbc"
                    using â€¹prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')â‡™(t n')))â€º
                    ut.prefix_length[of sbc 0 "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n'"] by auto
                  then obtain nâ‡©p where "nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n'"
                    and "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' nâ‡©p) < length sbc" by auto
                  hence "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + nâ‡©p) 0) < length sbc" using devExt_shift[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' n' nâ‡©p] by simp
                  moreover from â€¹âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥n'â€º â€¹nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n'â€º have "(n' + nâ‡©p) â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
                  ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹n'â‰¥nâ‡©sâ€º dishonest by auto
                next
                  assume "Â¬(âˆƒn'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âˆ§ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')))"
                  hence cas: "âˆ€n'â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™. n'â‰¥nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))" by auto
                  show ?thesis
                  proof cases
                    assume "Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)"
                    thus ?thesis
                    proof cases
                      assume "âˆ€n'<nâ‡©s. Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')"
                      with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)â€º have "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0 = []" by simp
                      with â€¹Â¬ sbc=[]â€º have "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0) < length sbc" by simp
                      moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
                      moreover from cas have "âˆ€n''>nâ‡©s. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by simp
                      ultimately show ?thesis by auto
                    next
                      let ?P="Î»n'. n'<nâ‡©s âˆ§ Â¬Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')"
                      let ?n'="GREATEST n'. ?P n'"
                      assume "Â¬ (âˆ€n'<nâ‡©s. Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'))"
                      moreover have "âˆ€n'>nâ‡©s. Â¬ ?P n'" by simp
                      ultimately have exists: "âˆƒn'. ?P n' âˆ§ (âˆ€n''. ?P n''âŸ¶ n''â‰¤n')"
                        using boundedGreatest[of ?P] by blast
                      hence "?P ?n'" using GreatestI_ex_nat[of ?P] by auto
                      moreover from â€¹?P ?n'â€º have "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')âˆ¥â‡˜t ?n'â‡™" using devBC_act by simp
                      ultimately have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™t ?n')) < length sbc âˆ¨ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™(t ?n')))" using assms(4) by simp
                      thus ?thesis
                      proof
                        assume "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™t ?n')) < length sbc"
                        moreover from exists have "Â¬(âˆƒn'>?n'. ?P n')" using Greatest_ex_le_nat[of ?P] by simp
                        moreover from â€¹?P ?n'â€º have "âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')" by blast
                        with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)â€º
                          have "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™(t ?n'))" by simp
                        ultimately have "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0) < length sbc" by simp
                        moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
                        moreover from cas have "âˆ€n''>nâ‡©s. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by simp
                        ultimately show ?thesis by auto
                      next
                        interpret ut: dishonest "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s" "Î»n. dmining t (nâ‡©s + n)"
                        proof
                          fix n''
                          from devExt_devop[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' nâ‡©s] have "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ nâ‡©s + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))â‡™t (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))" .
                          thus "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'') âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ dmining t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')"
                          proof
                            assume "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'')" thus ?thesis by simp
                          next
                            assume "(âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ nâ‡©s + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))â‡™t (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))"
                            hence "âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n'' @ [b]"
                              and "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))"
                              and "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')â‡™"
                              and "nâ‡©s + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
                              and "mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))â‡™t (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))"
                              by auto
                            moreover from â€¹nâ‡©s + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))â€º
                              have "Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')))"
                              using cas by simp
                            with â€¹âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (nâ‡©s + Suc n'')â‡™â€º
                              have "the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))âˆˆactDn (t (nâ‡©s + Suc n''))" using actDn_def by simp
                            ultimately show ?thesis using dmining_def by auto
                          qed
                        qed
  
                        assume "prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™(t ?n')))"
                        moreover from exists have "Â¬(âˆƒn'>?n'. ?P n')" using Greatest_ex_le_nat[of ?P] by simp
                        moreover from â€¹?P ?n'â€º have "âˆƒn'<nâ‡©s. Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n')" by blast
                        with â€¹Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)â€º have "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' ?n')â‡™(t ?n'))" by simp
                        ultimately have "prefix sbc (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0)" by simp
                        moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
                        with â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)â‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©s)" using devExt_bc_geq by simp
                        with â€¹Â¬ prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))â€º â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º have "Â¬ prefix sbc (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©s))" by simp
                        ultimately have "âˆƒn'''>0. n''' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©s âˆ§ length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s n''') < length sbc" using ut.prefix_length[of sbc 0 "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©s"] by simp
                        then obtain nâ‡©p where "nâ‡©p>0" and "nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©s" and "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s nâ‡©p) < length sbc" by auto
                        hence "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (nâ‡©s + nâ‡©p) 0) < length sbc" using devExt_shift by simp
                        moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
                        with â€¹nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©sâ€º have "(nâ‡©s + nâ‡©p) â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
                        moreover from â€¹nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-nâ‡©sâ€º have "nâ‡©p â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" by simp
                        moreover have "âˆ€n''>nâ‡©s + nâ‡©p. n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" using cas by simp
                        ultimately show ?thesis by auto
                      qed
                    qed
                  next
                    assume asmp: "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)"

                    moreover from asmp have "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)âˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡©sâ‡™"
                      using devBC_act by simp
                    ultimately have "the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)âˆˆactDn (t nâ‡©s)"
                      using actDn_def by simp
                    hence "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)â‡™(t nâ‡©s))) < length sbc"
                      using assms(2) by simp
                    moreover from asmp have
                      "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0 = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s)â‡™(t nâ‡©s))"
                      by simp
                    ultimately have "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' nâ‡©s 0) < length sbc" by simp
                    moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
                    moreover from cas have "âˆ€n''>nâ‡©s. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by simp
                    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
                  qed
                qed
                then obtain n' where "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥n'" and "n'â‰¥nâ‡©s"
                  and "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' 0) < length sbc"
                  and dishonest: "âˆ€n''>n'. n''â‰¤âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'') âŸ¶ Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n''))" by auto
                interpret ut: dishonest "devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'" "Î»n. dmining t (n' + n)"
                proof
                  fix n''
                  from devExt_devop[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' n']
                  have "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'') âˆ¨
                    (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â‡™t (n' + Suc n''))" .
                  thus "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'')
                    âˆ¨ (âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ dmining t (n' + Suc n'')"
                  proof
                    assume "prefix (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'')) (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'')"
                    thus ?thesis by simp
                  next
                    assume "(âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]) âˆ§ Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')) âˆ§ âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™ âˆ§ n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ âˆ§ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â‡™t (n' + Suc n''))"
                    hence "âˆƒb. devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (Suc n'') = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' n'' @ [b]"
                      and "Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))"
                      and "âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™"
                      and "n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"

                      by auto
                    moreover from â€¹n' + Suc n'' â‰¤ âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â€º â€¹Â¬ Option.is_none (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))â€º
                      have "Â¬ honest (the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n'')))" using dishonest by simp
                    with â€¹âˆ¥the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆ¥â‡˜t (n' + Suc n'')â‡™â€º
                      have "the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' (n' + Suc n''))âˆˆactDn (t (n' + Suc n''))"
                      using actDn_def by simp
                    ultimately show ?thesis using dmining_def by auto
                  qed
                qed
                interpret dishonest_growth "devLgthBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'" "Î»n. dmining t (n' + n)"
                  by unfold_locales
                interpret honest_growth "Î»n. PoW t (n' + n)" "Î»n. hmining t (n' + n)"
                proof
                  show "â‹€n. PoW t (n' + n) â‰¤ PoW t (n' + Suc n)" using pow_mono by simp
                  show "â‹€n. hmining t (n' + Suc n) âŸ¹ PoW t (n' + n) < PoW t (n' + Suc n)"
                    using pow_mining_suc by simp
                qed
                interpret bg: bounded_growth "length sbc" "Î»n. PoW t (n' + n)" "devLgthBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n'" "Î»n. hmining t (n' + n)" "Î»n. dmining t (n' + n)" "length sbc" cb
                proof
                  from assms(3) â€¹n'â‰¥nâ‡©sâ€º show "length sbc + cb â‰¤ PoW t (n' + 0)" using pow_mono[of nâ‡©s n' t] by simp
                next
                  from â€¹length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' 0) < length sbcâ€º show "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' 0) < length sbc" .
                next
                  fix n'' n'''
                  assume "cb < card {i. n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' âˆ§ dmining t (n' + i)}"
                  hence "cb < card {i. n'' + n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' + n' âˆ§ dmining t i}"
                    using cardshift[of n'' n''' "dmining t" n'] by simp
                  with fair[of "n'' + n'" "n''' + n'" t]
                  have "cb < card {i. n'' + n' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' + n' âˆ§ hmining t i}" by simp
                  thus "cb < card {i. n'' < i âˆ§ i â‰¤ n''' âˆ§ hmining t (n' + i)}"
                    using cardshift[of n'' n''' "hmining t" n'] by simp
                qed
                from â€¹âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥n'â€º have "length (devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n')) < PoW t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
                  using bg.hn_upper_bound[of "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n'"] by simp
                moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º â€¹âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‰¥n'â€º
                  have "bc (Ïƒâ‡˜the (devBC t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)â‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = devExt t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ nid' n' (âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™-n')"
                  using devExt_bc_geq[of t "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" nid' "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™" n'] by simp
                ultimately have "length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))) < PoW t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™"
                  using â€¹âˆ¥nid'âˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º by simp
                moreover have "PoW t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¤ length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))" (is "?lhs â‰¤ ?rhs")
                proof -
                  from â€¹honest nidâ€º â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™â€º
                    have "?lhs â‰¤ length (MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))" using pow_le_max by simp
                  also from â€¹bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)) = MAX (pin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))â€º
                    have "â€¦ = length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nid'â‡™(t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))" by simp
                  finally show ?thesis .
                qed
                ultimately show False by simp
              qed
            qed
            moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™=n" using nxtAct_active by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis by auto
          qed
          moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™=n" using nxtAct_active by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis by auto
        next
          assume "Â¬ (âˆƒbâˆˆpin (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™). length b > length (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)))"
          moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "âˆƒn'â‰¥n. âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™" by auto
          moreover from lAct have "âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'" by auto
          ultimately have "Â¬ mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ¨
            mining (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) âˆ§ (âˆƒb. bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) = bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™) @ [b])"
            using â€¹honest nidâ€º bhv_hn_in[of nid n t] by simp
          moreover have "prefix sbc (bc (Ïƒâ‡˜nidâ‡™t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™))"
          proof -
            from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'â€º have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ < n" using latestAct_prop(2) by simp
            moreover from lAct have "âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™ â‰¥ nâ‡©s" using latestActless by blast
            moreover from â€¹âˆƒn'. latestAct_cond nid t n n'â€º have "âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™â‡™"
              using latestAct_prop(1) by simp
            with â€¹honest nidâ€º have "nid âˆˆ actHn (t âŸ¨nid â† tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™)" using actHn_def by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis using step.IH by auto
          qed
          moreover from â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡™=n" using nxtAct_active by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis by auto
        qed
      next
        assume nAct: "Â¬ (âˆƒn' < n. n' â‰¥ nâ‡©s âˆ§ âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t n'â‡™)"
        moreover from step.hyps have "nâ‡©s â‰¤ n" by simp
        ultimately have "âŸ¨nid â†’ tâŸ©â‡˜nâ‡©sâ‡™ = n" using â€¹âˆ¥nidâˆ¥â‡˜t nâ‡™â€º nxtAct_eq[of nâ‡©s n nid t] by simp
        with â€¹honest nidâ€º show ?thesis using assms(1) by auto
      qed
    qed
  qed
  with assms(5) show ?thesis by simp
qed

end

end
